Recast.AI.How It Works Text:
"Recast.AI is the collaborative end-to-end bot platform for developers. 
By developing a powerful natural language processing (NLP) technology and putting it at the disposal of developers through a collaborative end-to-end bot platform, we make bot building simple, quick and very efficient. With all necessary tools to build, train, connect & monitor chatbots, developers can easily create very powerful conversation interfaces. Our platform is collaborative, allowing our 25,000+ users to fork bots, share their bot skills and work collaboratively. "
Recast.AI.Value Proposition Text:
"Recast.AI is the collaborative end-to-end bot platform for developers.
The strengh of Recast.AI comes from three main pillars: technology, bot building and community. 
Firstly, we are developing a strong and powerful natural language processing (NLP) technology. This technology, based on deep learning, allows our users to analyse sentences, detect their intent (classification) and extract key information called entities (named entity recognition or NER). Recast.AI provides by default an extensive enrichment of 35+ entities such as location, datetimes or temperatures. To this we've also added emoji support, sentiment analysis, dialog management or expression suggestions, leveraging data augmentation to drastically fasten bot building. This NLP technology allows the creation of chatbots in any language, from English to Hebrew through Japanese. 
Second, bot building is done through our free platform. In this platform, we've developed a complete suite of tools for bot building. Developers can train their bot, build their conversational flow in a visual builder (using our unique Bot Skills technology), connect bots to any channel in a few clicks (Messenger, Slack, Kik, Skype, etc) and monitor its use. All of this for free.
Finally, from the beginning, Recast.AI has been a collaborative platform. Today, more than 25,000 developers use our technology and tools. Bots built on Recast.AI can be forked, Bot Skills can be shared, and you can work collaboratively on a bot. The community also exchanges tips and tricks on our Slack Community.

While our technology is used by developers all around the world, we also work closely with major corporations to automate their customer supports with chatbots. 

With Recast.AI, you have all tools necessary to the building of powerful bots and can provide great conversational interfaces in a heartbeat. "

DigitalGenius brings practical applications of artificial intelligence into the customer service operations of large and growing companies. 0.Title: Ernst & Young
0.Long Description: Global professional services firm EY has today been revealed as our first certified implementer. Having recently completed the PypePro Implementation Training Program, EY firms are now equipped to implement and integrate our solution, train customers on user-onboarding, inform messaging strategies and support existing customers about our technology and services.  EY PYPEPRO CERTIFICATION The PypePro program takes our enterprise clients through a rigorous six-phase plan to transform their business for the on-demand economy. The EY certification covered a comprehensive breakdown of Pypestream’s solution including the smart messaging platform, sales and user onboarding strategies, reporting and analytics, system integrations, and process automation via AI and chatbots. EY will now work to bring Pypestream’s customer engagement solution to a vast network of clients and customers while providing the global horsepower and expertise to quickly and efficiently scale the Pypestream platform.  “Intelligent messaging is moving from insurance customer service to core operational functions,” said David Connolly, the EY Global Digital Insurance Leader. “Pypestream can provide a secure and user-friendly means to gather essential information allowing insurance policies to be issued, bills to be paid and claims settled without the involvement of insurance company representatives or agents.”  Building on the success of EY’s initial certification, Pypestream is rolling out the implementation program to train enterprises in additional verticals and educate additional businesses about the benefits of their solution.  6 Phases of PypePro Certification:  1.  MATRIX: Business use-cases are identified and measured against a set of specific metrics and ranked in matrix based on priority level.  2. EMPOWER: Comprehensive training is provided for all of our products and services, along with a detailed overview of messaging best practices.  3. ENGAGE: Educational initiatives such as onboarding videos and emails, social media posts, web graphics, web campaigns and IVR language are delivered to drive end-user adoption.  4. PYPEBOT DESIGN: User personas inform the design of each customized PypeBot, while our proprietary NLP accentuates the quality of the end-user’s experience. The results: smart messaging for the highest volume inquiries, and increased Net Promoter Scores.  5. ANALYTICS: Data analysis is fully facilitated for all bot interactions and actionable recommendations are provided to continually improve engagement.  6. INTEGRATIONS: All integrations with existing back-end data systems are executed on the client’s behalf using APIs. Full requirements definition and documentation is provided to empower bots and agents with transactional capabilities, all through an omnichannel experience for end-users.  PYPESTREAM FOR THE INSURANCE INDUSTRY Pypestream provides a complete SaaS solution to insurance companies and enterprises that enables real-time customer service, secure in-message billing and payments, and business process transformation. The simplified, three-step transformation results in on-demand connectivity across all devices between the consumer and the insurance provider. We do this by leveraging smart messaging, intuitive user experiences, and automation via chatbots and AI.  “Pypestream’s customer engagement solution is just the beginning of trend we’re seeing industry-wide to implement smart, secure messaging strategies to meet customers where they are,” said Dave Dias, founder and chairman of Insurance Thought Leadership.

Pypestream.How It Works Text: Our Smart Messaging Platform is purpose-built for the enterprise and uses a patented framework to separate communication into topic-specific channels. Key features include: Secure and compliant-by-design: data on Pypestream is protected with end-to-end encryption and remains the property of the enterprise. In-message payments: securely transact with customers within the messaging stream. Multimedia support: send PDFs, images, and videos for rich messaging experiences. Back-end integrations: pull customer data into the Pypestream platform through your existing CMS and CRM systems. Automation-enabled: seamlessly deploy chatbots to automate the messaging experience.
Pypestream.Value Proposition Text: PYPESTREAM IS AN ENTERPRISE-GRADE, SECURE AND COMPLIANT ENGAGEMENT SOLUTION PURPOSE-BUILT FOR BUSINESS

0.Title: Footwear and apparel retailer
0.Long Description:
Markdown Optimization Scores 6% Increase in Gross Margin
CHALLENGE: ENHANCE MARKDOWN STRATEGIES TO CAPTURE MARGIN AND IMPROVE SELL-THROUGH
A leading footwear and apparel retailer had been using historical sales and merchant intuition to drive its pricing strategy and markdown decisions. The company required a more effective approach to increase sell-through velocity and minimize the negative impact on margin.
SOLUTION: AN ANALYTICS-BACKED MARKDOWN MODEL 
Prognos, an Antuit company, developed a data-driven markdown strategy that supported business processes in both the United States and Europe. For the company, Prognos:
Developed an advanced forecasting and elasticity model incorporating multiple variables including trends, seasonality, lifecycle, price, promotions, and inventory effects
Introduced a pricing algorithm to maximize revenue, sell-through, and margin using localized pricing
Developed an "analytical cockpit" to constantly monitor system performance and financial impact 
Provided an intuitive user interface that enabled merchants to setup their own business rules
RESULTS: 10% SELL-THROUGH IMPROVEMENT, 6% MARGIN BOOST
In the first year of execution, the client improved sell-through by 10%, increased Average Unit Retail (AUR) by 2-3%,  and improved margin by 6%.

1.Title: Regional supermarket chain
1.Long Description:
CHALLENGE: EFFECTIVELY COMPETE AGAINST A MAJOR RETAILER WITHOUT SACRIFICING MARGIN
SOLUTION: OPTIMIZE PROMOTIONAL PRICES TO DRIVE STORE TRAFFIC
A key component of the solution was AD-IN, Prognos’ weekly ad circular optimization tool. Using the regional chain's transaction and loyalty data, Prognos applied predictive analytics within AD-IN to identify key purchasing behaviors including visit frequency, basket sizes, price elasticity and promotion responsiveness. Solution features included:
Price elasticity and demand curves to better understand shopping behavior, seasonality and pricing for Known Value Items.
An optimization engine that calculates optimal product mix, price points and ad placements based on financial performance.
Intuitive user interface that allows planners to enter business rules and constraints, as well as view results.
OUTCOME: IMPROVED PERFORMANCE OF ITS WEEKLY CIRCULAR AND UNCOVERED AN AVERAGE MARGIN INCREASE OF 8%

1.Title: Ageas

2.Title: Sky
2.Long Description: Afiniti was first deployed in 2014 across 400 agents within the inbound telesales and Upgrades team, replacing Sky’s historical ‘first-in first-out’ call flow model with Afiniti’s Enterprise Behavioral Pairing. Afiniti’s behavioral pairing technology is the only contact center solution that optimizes call outcomes to pair agents with callers in real time based on behavior. This leads to an increased likelihood that callers and agents feel a natural rapport, a decisive factor in environments where revenues can be won or lost. The results of Afiniti were immediate: sales conversion rates jumped and Afiniti’s patented benchmarking process permitted Sky to monitor and precisely measure the ongoing positive impact.

Afiniti.How It Works Text: Using big data analytics, Afiniti analyzes customer data from third parties and internal client data to provide a holistic view of individual customers and agents. We then use artificial intelligence algorithms to determine the optimal fit between callers and agents. We refer to this process as Enterprise Behavioral Pairing™, or EBP™.Every 24 hours, these artificial intelligence algorithms scan newly generated contact center data to improve our behavioral pairing algorithms.Afiniti’s artificial intelligence systems sit at the convergence of computer science, mathematics, psychology, linguistics, philosophy and neuroscience. Over the past decade, we have pioneered several applications of statistics and mathematics within the contact center industry.We currently process approximately 400,000 calls a day to improve our algorithm's ability to achieve optimal agent and caller pairings. Our technology discovers subtle patterns of interaction between callers and agents that serve as the basis for creating optimal pairings. Ongoing training of our artificial intelligence models is important because of the dynamic nature of contact centers: agents change, incentive structures shift, competitive pressures evolve and even weather and holidays can have an impact.
Afiniti.Value Proposition Text: Afiniti enhances human interactions in large enterprises by efficiently pairing customers with employees based on predicted interpersonal behavior. Our applied artificial intelligence technology is generally applicable to the optimization of any interaction with the possibility of a selection between more than one person. Currently we are focused on improving contact center interactions conducted over the phone, and we also provide optimizations for live chat, email, online video and in-person applications.

Results: One of the biggest challenges that many companies face with social engagement is that it is extremely easy to get overwhelmed by having to sift through large volumes of spam, unrelated, or non-actionable social comments. For Aramex, this is no longer a problem. With the help of Engagor, Aramex is able to automatically prioritize customer mentions through notifications, filters, and folders. This increases the team’s productivity and effectiveness. It gives the team better visibility into how customers think and engage with the Aramex brand globally. 5.Title: GlaxoSmithKline
5.Long Description:
Tapping Into Online Discussions to Understand Parental Concerns: 

GlaxoSmithKline (GSK) is a science-led, global healthcare company that develops vaccines, medicines, and consumer healthcare products to improve people's health and well-being worldwide.

During a period of time when the United States and the United Kingdom were experiencing noticeable spikes in measles cases, pharmaceutical company GlaxoSmithKline wanted to understand motivating factors behind parental decisions to vaccinate their children. Because of the tightly controlled regulations on how pharmaceutical companies can interact with their customers, GSK needed to find a non-intrusive, efficient way to gain insight into parental concerns around vaccines and the vaccination process.

GSK turned to Luminoso to surface crucial insights from online discussion boards, where thousands of parents voiced their concerns and asked questions about vaccinating their children. With Luminoso, GSK was able to:

- instantly surface drivers or parent apprehension around the vaccination process
- leverage new understanding of parental concerns to create new educational material, messaging, and patient interaction strategies – all in a fraction of the time it would have taken with traditional methods of research and analysis.

6.Title: Global Consumer Electronics Company
6.Long Description:
A leading global consumer electronics company was about to launch their first wearable technology product. Given the publicity surrounding the event, they needed to resolve any user issues that might occur as quickly as possible. However, most solutions they reviewed relied on keyword lists and ontologies, which were inflexible and would take too long to configure. Moreover, they weren't capable of processing data in multiple languages.

The company used Luminoso Compass to accurately identify, categorize, and label the underlying intent expressed in multi-lingual feedback.  Afterwards Luminoso quickly surfaced and monitored key and emerging issues, especially those that would not be captured by traditional keyword searches.

Because of Luminoso, the company was able to:

- Identify intent and root causes of customer concerns after the product launch
- Surface unexpected issues with the product that would have otherwise gone unnoticed
- Uncover and track issues over time, enabling the company's analysts to quickly identify and triage emerging issues

Luminoso.How It Works Text: In this quick demo, we provide an overview of Luminoso's Analytics software and how it can be used to quickly explore and analyze unstructured data like product reviews, open-ended survey responses, and call center transcripts.
Luminoso.Value Proposition Text: Luminoso's AI solutions apply over a decade of cutting-edge research in natural language processing and machine learning to help companies quickly uncover value in their text data. Data can be natively processed in thirteen languages, including Korean, Chinese, and Japanese.

Cortical.io.Value Proposition Text: Cortical.io offers Natural Language Understanding (NLU) solutions based on Semantic Folding, a theory which opens a fundamentally new perspective to handling Big Text Data. Amazon Lex integrates with AWS Lambda which you can use to easily trigger functions for execution of your back-end business logic for data retrieval and updates. Once built, your bot can be deployed directly to chat platforms, mobile clients, and IoT devices. You can also use the reports provided to track metrics for your bot. Amazon Lex provides a scalable, secure, easy to use, end-to-end solution to build, publish and monitor your bots.

Gupshup.How It Works Text: Develop Build chat bots with our cloud based Integrated Developer Environment(IDE). NLP / AI Leverage tools that make it easier to add NLP and AI modules to your bot. Test Test your bot in a production setting using the Gupshup Proxy Bot. Use automated testing tools. Deploy Host your bot automatically on the Gupshup platform. Publish to messaging apps or the web. Monitor Use automated tools to monitor your bot's performance, responsiveness and uptime. Analytics Use integrated logs and analytics tools to understand and optimize bot interactions.

Talkwalker.How It Works Text: Know the conversations that matter using the widest data coverage. Analyze results in real-time and find deeper insights faster with our text and image analytics. Save time with our automated reports and share key findings in seconds. Turn social data insights into action instantly, leveraging our use-case driven platform.
Talkwalker.Value Proposition Text: Talkwalker is a social data intelligence platform that empowers agencies and brands to make data-driven decisions. Our state of the art platform monitors and analyzes online conversations on social networks, news websites, blogs, forums and more, in 187 languages.

Wantoo.How It Works Text: Wantoo Idea Boards help you get feedback wherever and whenever customers interact with your company, so you’re collecting data at every point along the customer journey—physical, web, or mobile—with just a single line of code. Plays well with Salesforce, Zendesk, Twitter, and more. Not all customer feedback is equal, so don’t waste time, money, and goodwill treating all feedback the same way. Wantoo helps you structure and prioritize every suggestion, so you can feed the winners directly to the teams best equipped to act. Go beyond dumb data and get deeper insight into what makes your customers tick. Avoid the black hole of Customer Experience management software. Don’t let valuable insights die on the way to the product team: Wantoo helps you finish the job by syncing your data with the tools you use to organize your tasks, including Slack, Trello, and Jira. Meanwhile, automatically close the feedback loop by keeping customers up to speed on the changes they suggested.
Wantoo.Value Proposition Text: Wantoo is a simple, powerful cloud-based platform that makes it easy to listen, analyze, and act on feedback from your team, your customers or anyone else. Set it up in seconds.

Reputology.How It Works Text: Reputology’s fully automated, around-the-clock review tracking platform monitors reviews on all the important sites as well as industry-specific ones important to your business. Reputology makes managing reviews across multiple locations simple, and you can customize the dashboard view to suit local operators, the head office and anyone in between. Collect and manage feedback at key points in the customer experience so that you can understand what’s working (and what isn’t) and make improvements to your business. Reputology also helps you identify who’s happy and who’s not and automates the process for turning happy customers into promoters and responding to unhappy customers quickly.  Discover what’s driving positive and negative customer sentiment. The Text Analytics module analyzes the free form text in reviews and feedback and displays the results in Word Cloud reports so you can easily identify recurring themes and trends. Reputology turns improving the customer experience into a quantifiable and measurable process for your organization.
Reputology.Value Proposition Text: Reputology is the Review Management and Monitoring platform that helps multi-location businesses improve

Consisting of four core components, Teneo Interaction Engine, Teneo Studio, Teneo Language Resources and Teneo Analytics, the platform ensures that every aspect from creating and maintaining your NLI application to analysing customer feedback is easy.

Talkdesk.How It Works Text: Call Monitoring    Listen to calls in real-time, without the agent or caller knowing, to silently guarantee quality standards are being met.    Call Barging    Drop in on live calls to speak with both the caller and agent to reduce call transfers and increase customer satisfaction.    Historical Reporting    Monitor the performance of your company so you can make intelligent business decisions based on comprehensive data.    Talkdesk Live    Get an overview of what’s happening in your call center at any given time so you can improve business KPIs.    Agent Reporting    Assess the performance of your team with agent metrics such as real-time and historical agent status data, average speed to answer and average call duration.    Custom Reporting    Create custom reports by filtering by ring group, phone number, agent, department and time frame to effectively analyze the metrics that matter to your business. Gnip.How It Works Text: Gnip’s Data Collector offers managed public API access to over a dozen social media sources. Unlike PowerTrack, which offers realtime filtering on full social data firehoses, the Data Collector sends requests for social data from public API endpoints on your behalf. The Data Collector makes the process of getting social data from public APIs easier for you by providing the appliance to collect and send social data directly to you in a normalized data format. By integrating a Gnip Data Collector into your product, you can focus on data analytics and best-serving your clients, rather than building and maintaining numerous public API integrations.
Gnip.Value Proposition Text: Gnip is the world's largest and most trusted provider of social data, serving customers in a range of industries from social media monitoring and business intelligence to finance and government. Gnip was acquired by Twitter in April 2014. Gnip's customers deliver social media analytics to over 95% of the Fortune 500. Gnip delivers more than 120 billion realtime social data activities each month, providing access to data from dozens of sources.

Lithium Technologies.How It Works Text: Listen, respond, and publish on social networks—and connect social networks to your website through sharing, social login, and curated social feeds. Tie Lithium seamlessly into your CMS, knowledge base, ad server, and product catalogs. Then, measure success with integrated surveys and web analytics. Easily customize your community and still benefit from monthly upgrades. Create unique customer experiences using the Lithium-Klout SDK for developers and partners. Synchronize social profiles and conversations with your marketing automation, email, events, CRM, and loyalty systems.
Lithium Technologies.Value Proposition Text: Comprising Social Media Management and Communities, the Lithium engagement platform enables brands to manage multiple digital touchpoints, facilitate millions of conversations, and drive smarter decisions through data – connecting customers, content and conversations at the right digital moment.

DataSift.How It Works Text: Play with clean and enriched data set and leave data processing to us to aggregate, normalize and augment the data for you. Trust us with reliable, real-time and high throughput delivery of mission critical data with a system designed from the ground up to handle big data scale.
DataSift.Value Proposition Text: DataSift is the leader in Human Data Intelligence that empowers application developers to maximize the value of Human Data, in real-time. Processing more than 2 billion human-generated interactions a day, the privacy-first DataSift platform transforms Human Data into actionable intelligence without compromising consumer trust.

fred knows.How It Works Text: By asking smart multiple-choice questions, fred knows finds the shortest path to right solution for your customers. This allows your customers to get instant, self-service support. Unlike other chatbots, fred knows is quick to integrate into your existing customer support flow and can handle complex customer requests. The average resolution time is just 12.4 seconds.
fred knows.Value Proposition Text: fred knows is the smarter customer support bot that enables your customers to get instant, self-service support with just the click of a button, or a tap of the finger. In the meantime, your agents can focus on the more challenging customer problems and deliver outstanding service.

Recast.AI.How It Works Text:
"Recast.AI is the collaborative end-to-end bot platform for developers. 
By developing a powerful natural language processing (NLP) technology and putting it at the disposal of developers through a collaborative end-to-end bot platform, we make bot building simple, quick and very efficient. With all necessary tools to build, train, connect & monitor chatbots, developers can easily create very powerful conversation interfaces. Our platform is collaborative, allowing our 25,000+ users to fork bots, share their bot skills and work collaboratively. "
Recast.AI.Value Proposition Text:
"Recast.AI is the collaborative end-to-end bot platform for developers.
The strengh of Recast.AI comes from three main pillars: technology, bot building and community. 
Firstly, we are developing a strong and powerful natural language processing (NLP) technology. This technology, based on deep learning, allows our users to analyse sentences, detect their intent (classification) and extract key information called entities (named entity recognition or NER). Recast.AI provides by default an extensive enrichment of 35+ entities such as location, datetimes or temperatures. To this we've also added emoji support, sentiment analysis, dialog management or expression suggestions, leveraging data augmentation to drastically fasten bot building. This NLP technology allows the creation of chatbots in any language, from English to Hebrew through Japanese. 
Second, bot building is done through our free platform. In this platform, we've developed a complete suite of tools for bot building. Developers can train their bot, build their conversational flow in a visual builder (using our unique Bot Skills technology), connect bots to any channel in a few clicks (Messenger, Slack, Kik, Skype, etc) and monitor its use. All of this for free.
Finally, from the beginning, Recast.AI has been a collaborative platform. Today, more than 25,000 developers use our technology and tools. Bots built on Recast.AI can be forked, Bot Skills can be shared, and you can work collaboratively on a bot. The community also exchanges tips and tricks on our Slack Community.

While our technology is used by developers all around the world, we also work closely with major corporations to automate their customer supports with chatbots. 

With Recast.AI, you have all tools necessary to the building of powerful bots and can provide great conversational interfaces in a heartbeat. "

deepPiXEL can engage with users individually, smoothly handle spikes in user queries, and queue complex questions to human agents.

Plus, our unique NLP gives our solution a larger number of answers and better accuracy, providing greater value to the customer while reducing costs to the company.

Our automated live chat helps customer support teams quickly and easily respond to queries and answer questions.   Our platform build using machine learning not only learns over time but uses feedback from customer service agents to do reinfoicement.

Pat Inc.How It Works Text: Combining a Linguistic framework, Role and Reference Grammar (RRG) and Patom Theory, the NLU breaks down language by meaning overcoming open scientific problems in Natural Language Understanding such as word sense disambiguation.
Pat Inc.Value Proposition Text: Pat delivers developers/companies the semantic relationships of words in context, via API so they can build their own language based applications based on the meaning with human-like accuracy. Pat's meaning platform is suitable for language based applications of the future such as Language Learning, Home Automation, Chatbots, Intelligent Assistants andText Analytics.

0.Title: First Solar
0.Long Description: Prior to AppZen, First Solar was manually auditing 100% of their expense reports via an in-house, offshore audit team. As business began to grow rapidly, the team was unable to handle the extra volume and meet their required 3-day SLA. Within a month of implementing AppZen, they were able to reduce the resources required for audit by 45%, while easily meeting their SLAs.

AppZen.How It Works Text: No need to change your expense reporting software – simply record expenses in your existing system, as you do today. AppZen’s automated audit seamlessly integrates with all major ERP and expense software, including Oracle, Concur, NetSuite, and Coupa. AppZen’s AI examines every expense in real-time. All receipts, tickets, and other documentation are inspected – producing a full understanding of the who, where, and why of every expense. The AI verifies receipts, eliminates duplicates, and searches through hundreds of data sources to verify merchant identities and validate the truthfulness of every expense – ensuring there is no fraud, misuse, or violation of laws. Every expense report is assigned a risk score, with suspicious ones marked “high risk” on your AppZen dashboard and sent to you in real time alerts. Enabling the Finance and T&E team to focus on only the fraction of expense reports with fraud or compliance issues – and rest easy knowing the remainder have been verified.
AppZen.Value Proposition Text: AppZen’s Real-Time Expense Report Audit seamlessly integrates with your existing expense reporting tools. Our AI audit engine can be up and running quickly and doesn’t require changes to your existing expense reporting tools.

UiPath.How It Works Text:
We design and deliver the most advanced automation platform. Businesses of all sizes, BPO providers and shared service organizations around the world use our software to provide exceptional benefits in operational quality, speed and cost.

Our RPA platform consists of UiPath Studio, UiPath Robot, UiPath Orchestrator.

UiPath Studio is an intuitive environment where automation can be designed visually by business users. It comes with template activities and has an easy drag-and-drop functionality. Powerful recorders are embedded which can register mouse clicks and keyboard strokes and transform them into an automated workflow. This highly intuitive automation design tool makes it accessible to a broad community of not only technical but also business people to develop automation fast and easy. 

UiPath Robot executes the automation and is specialized in both attended (triggered by an employee’s direct command in business activities where human input is needed at key points) and unattended scenarios (processing silently, in batch mode, any type of back-office process that does not require human intervention). 

UiPath Orchestrator is the control room where you can manage and monitor the entire robotic workforce, deployed on-premises or in the cloud.
UiPath.Value Proposition Text: We believe human work should be creative and inspiring.We help businesses automate more efficiently and develop an agile robotic workforce by providing state-of-the-art technology. Designing intelligent solutions for today’s (and tomorrow’s) enterprises.

5.Long Description: Thanks to Kapow, we were able to move all 800,000 documents to our main ECM system in a matter of days. Without Kapow, it probably would have taken several weeks to migrate everything—and the complexity of the project would have increased the cost significantly

Kofax.How It Works Text: We’re talking about intelligent software robots that automate virtually any business activity. Robotic process automation (RPA) enables your business to create an intelligent software-based robotic digital workforce that lowers the costs associated with repetitive, manual intervention with your systems. RPA can create transformative efficiency and productivity gains, drive greater process, and spur superior customer service. Regardless of the use case, robotic process automation is the type of intelligent automation software that automates the repetitive manual data-intensive work making the business more efficient, while lowering costs.
Kofax.Value Proposition Text: Create an Intelligent Digital Workforce with Robotic Process Automation.

0.Title: NOAA Fisheries
0.Long Description: I am so impressed with the results the folks at deepsense.ai were able to achieve. The task of identifying individual whales from photographs is no easy feat and their CNN approach was able to achieve 87% correct classification!

1.Title: BMC Software
1.Long Description: My overall impression from the workshop was positive, the instructors were knowledgeable and also were able to draw on their experiences to give relevant examples during the discussions.

2.Title: United Nations
2.Long Description: We were very happy with the workshop. The format was good and deepsense.ai’s instructors were excellent as trainers: experts in the subject matter obviously, but also good at conveying the knowledge. The participants very much enjoyed it.

3.Title: Apple
3.Long Description: I really like how deepsense.ai’s workshop gave me a good overview of machine learning techniques and showed me how businesses use big data in general. It is a completely new way of thinking and the workshop introduces that very well.

4.Title: Nvidia
4.Long Description: AI is transforming every industry and having deepsense.ai as a member of our NVIDIA Service Delivery Partner program within the deep learning competency will help customers build their capabilities to take advantage of this opportunity.

5.Title: BCG
5.Long Description: deepsense.ai’s experts truly inspired us with their wide knowledge and grounded professional experience. They have a thorough understanding of machine learning applications across a range of industries and can help assess the opportunities it brings.

deepsense.ai.Value Proposition Text: The goal of deepsense.ai is to create and support leaders in the innovation race. We deliver AI solutions and assist organizations in unlocking their data science potential.

0.Title: Nissan
0.Long Description:
Senseye is providing PdM capability across multiple Nissan global production sites where models such as the Qashqai, X-Trail, Leaf and Infiniti are produced. Over 2,500 assets, including robots, conveyors, drop lifters, pumps, motors and press/stamping machines are remotely monitored using Senseye’s proprietary algorithms. More than 200 maintenance users actively use Senseye to optimise maintenance activities and make repairs months before predicted machine failure.

“Senseye is supporting our Predictive Maintenance programme across three production facilities and has helped us lower overall downtime and increase OEE.”
Damian Wheeler, Nissan UK Engineering Director

Senseye.How It Works Text:
Senseye takes machine condition and operations data from your factory historian, IoT middleware or database solutions. There is no need to add any hardware or install anything on-site.

Senseye is an industrial operations software tool, designed to be used on the shop-floor by the maintenance and operations people who need to keep things running smoothly and ensure that unplanned downtime stays down.

Like all good Industry 4.0 / Industrial IoT software, Senseye is designed to integrate seamlessly and provide maximum value by leveraging your existing investments. It focuses on automatically delivering advanced Predictive Maintenance insights in an easily understandable manner.
Senseye.Value Proposition Text: Senseye™ is the leading cloud-based software for Predictive Maintenance. It helps manufacturers avoid downtime and save money by automatically forecasting machine failure without the need for expert manual analysis. Its intelligent machine-learning algorithms allow it to be used on any machine from any manufacturer, taking information from existing Industrial IoT sensors and platforms to automatically diagnose failures and provide the remaining useful life of machinery.

RapidMiner.How It Works Text: To reduce financial risk and increase operational performance,Rapidminer combines machines learning,data prep and model deployment
RapidMiner.Value Proposition Text: A powerful & collaborative analytics platform for accelerating the creation, delivery, and maintenance of high-value data science. The RapidMiner Platform offers more functions than any other visual solution, plus it’s open and extensible to support all your data science needs.

Numenta.How It Works Text: For each monitored company, data is collected every five minutes for stock price, stock volume and Twitter volume. Actual data charts can be viewed in the application. Models are automatically built and refined for each data stream. No data scientists are required! Each company is different. HTM models report anomalies when current behavior deviates from recent behavior.
Numenta.Value Proposition Text: Creation of Numenta, (Hierarchical Temporal Memory (HTM) for Stocks is an example HTM application that continually monitors hundreds of publicly traded companies and alerts you if something unusual is happening to any of them.

Orbital Insight.How It Works Text: Orbital Insight develops geospatial analytics that unlock societal and economic trends at a global scale. The company works with leading providers to obtain satellite imagery, drone imagery, and other data from unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), then uses deep learning techniques to identify and quantify key features from this data. Deep learning allows Orbital Insight to analyze millions of pixels efficiently, a process that would otherwise be impossibly time-consuming to complete by hand. The company’s algorithms can count and track features like car counts, deforestation rates, new construction, flood peaks, oil storage tanks, and more. The resulting insights provide actionable information for businesses, governments, and NGOs to drive better business and policy decisions.
Orbital Insight.Value Proposition Text: Orbital Insight develops geospatial analytics that unlock societal and economic trends at a global scale. The company works with leading providers to obtain satellite imagery, drone imagery, and other data from unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), then uses deep learning techniques to identify and quantify key features from this data. Deep learning allows Orbital Insight to analyze millions of pixels efficiently, a process that would otherwise be impossibly time-consuming to complete by hand. The company’s algorithms can count and track features like car counts, deforestation rates, new construction, flood peaks, oil storage tanks, and more. The resulting insights provide actionable information for businesses, governments, and NGOs to drive better business and policy decisions.

WorkFusion.How It Works Text: WorkFusion’s AI-powered products provide all of the tools an operations team needs to automate business processes.RPA is one of the tools in WorkFusion’s automation toolkit. Most business processes begin with pulling data and end with pushing data, and WorkFusion makes RPA easy to apply to business processes that tap into legacy applications.
WorkFusion.Value Proposition Text: WorkFusion’s AI-powered products provide all of the tools an operations team needs to automate business processes.

0.Title: Adecco
0.Long Description: Adecco increases cash allocation efficiencyFebruary 1, 2015By Rimilia in cash flow management, Press releases, recruitment, accounts receivable software, adecco, Case Studies, Cash Allocation, cash allocation software, cash management, cash management solutions, finance, financial technology, Media centreAward winning financial software technology company Rimilia have been working in partnership with renowned recruitment provider Adecco to improve efficiency of cash allocation processes with great success.

Rimilia.How It Works Text: Within 6 weeks, Rimilia’s Alloc8 cash module can work in any country, with any ERP, any payment or deposit type, and remittance type in any sector/industry. As all the logic is built in we can achieve a rapid installation, with fast ROI as standard. The logic that we have built means we can take you to world class and beyond in 6-12 weeks, achieving world beating match rates of 90% and above in many cases. Even the items that are not automatched can be cleared with our one click intelligent AUTOFINDER ™. Never has the phrase “Too good to be true” been used so much.
Rimilia.Value Proposition Text: Rimilia provides unique, award-winning cloud-based solutions for Accounts Receivable, Bank Reconciliation, Cash Allocation / Application, Cash Forecasting, Credit Management and E-Commerce Reconciliation. Our solutions provide you with peace of mind that you’re making the right, risk-free decisions now and in the future.

Contextor.How It Works Text:
Contextor provides a combination of products that covers the whole range of RPA, Attended as well as Unattended:
Contextor Interactive is the RPA bot runtime. It analyzes the actions, orchestrates applications, streamlines processes, automates everything … and collects KPIs. It can be executed on PC desktops or in server farms.
Contextor Studio is the Integrated Development Environment, with a Visual Studio for workflow design, a set of documentation and widgets (SDK). It allows to quickly configure and maintain RPA projects.
Contextor Control Room is the server component for Unattended RPA. It offers services for bots supervision and monitoring, including tasks administration, workload distribution and process scheduling.
Contextor Galaxy is an optional server component. It offers services to each Contextor RPA bot, Attended or Unattended, by providing key information to better understand and improve processes in Business Activity Monitoring.
Contextor has unique features, such as
-	Visual Studio with Workflow designer allowing business and IT leaders to work together in designing, specifying, developing and maintaining bots, attended or unattended
-	Flexibility and openness, thanks to Javascript libraries
-	A smart robot architecture: we separate the application capture and the scripting to create reusable components and ease the maintenance effort.
-	A wide set of ad hoc connectors and libraries allowing to automate any technology or applications, including 
o	legacy systems: IBM 3270 & 5250, AS400, VT100, DKU, HLLAPI
o	Microsoft Windows environment and client-server applications
o	market standards: SAP, Siebel, MS Office, Oracle Forms…
o	native integration with virtualized architectures: Citrix ICA, Microsoft RDP
-	Easy interaction with applications at UI components level (DOM), not OCR-based or screenscraping
-	Remote process recorder for troubleshooting and analysis
Contextor solutions provides high performance on desktop or server, with very low footprint.
Contextor.Value Proposition Text: Contextor’s RPA software suite is accelerating digital transformation by improving customer experience and removing employee’s boring tasks, allowing them to focus on value added actions. Contextor is implemented without any modification of existing applications, allowing an immediate adoption by end users and an easy to measure return on investment.

Siemens.How It Works Text: Our portfolio of predictive services turns big data into smart data. Advances in digitalization give you insights into the condition of your machines and plants, so that you can respond to irregularities and threshhold deviations quickly – ideally long before a problem actually occurs.We support you in implementing strategies that help you avoid unscheduled shutdowns of your machines and plants. We help you exploit the optimization potential in managing your spare parts and thus reduce the associated costs. As your partner, we show you ways to identify hidden savings potential in your machines and plants – and to consistently tap this potential. Gain a clear picture of the condition of your automation system - as the basis for concept design, implementing updates and service activities. Our offer provides a high level of transparency for your machines worldwide – real added value for machine builders and end users. Each and every customer has individual requirements which is why our service packages can be tailored to your specific needs.
Siemens.Value Proposition Text: Innovative strength, a passion for technology, sustainability, responsibility and an uncompromising commitment to quality and excellence – this is what Siemens has exemplified for 170 years and it is what our claim “Ingenuity for life” stands for.

Schneider Electric.How It Works Text: Power system assessments are often the first inspections performed since equipment was originally installed.Power system assessments provide for visual inspections of portions or all of the existing power distribution system. Power system assessments determine the electrical and mechanical ‘health’ of the electrical equipment and power distribution system and how long they will likely continue to function as originally designed and intended. Infrared inspections use an infrared camera to detect anomalies not noticeable to the naked eye. Online temperature monitoring technology provides 24/7 access to critical connection points where traditional thermography cannot be used. Insulating fluid analysis measures the physical and chemical properties of oil in an oil-filled transformer. Technology is available to detect and notify facility engineers of impending insulation breakdown. Partial discharge monitoring is applicable on equipment rated 5 kV to 500 kV where the age of the insulation could be cause for concern. Circuit monitors record data relating to voltage, current, and power. They also offer a
Schneider Electric.Value Proposition Text: Enhance Power Equipment Reliability with Predictive Maintenance Technologies

Sisense.How It Works Text: Sisense is ideal for companies and departments in all industries that are looking for a flexible business intelligence system that’s powerful enough to crunch complex data. Businesses today need BI tools to measure their industry-specific metrics and KPIs, and provide on-time, ask-any-question data analysis for BI professionals, department heads, high-level executives and any business user to make the best decisions possible.
Sisense.Value Proposition Text: Your data is scattered across many different sources and growing every day. Sisense gives you the easiest way to create insights and business value from complex data.

Alluvium.How It Works Text: Alluvium's Mesh Intelligence platform delivers real-time operational insights to complex, expert-driven, industrial operations.

Presenso.Value Proposition Text: Constantly analyzing big Industrial IoT data in order to maximize machine up-time. Sophisticated Machine Learning and Deep Learning algorithms drive precise and continuous failure prediction. Convert insights into real operational savings through full predictive maintenance aimed at yield optimization. Learns and adapts to the different sensors and different machines. No expert knowledge needed.

Uptake.How It Works Text: Uptake's predictive platform enables partners to use data science to unlock new revenue streams.
Uptake.Value Proposition Text: Turn your data into actionable insights that make the world more productive, safe, secure, and reliable.

Sight Machine.How It Works Text: From data chaos to business impact. Sight Machine puts manufacturing data to work.Real-time visibility and actionable insights for every machine, line and plant across your entire enterprise. Configured to mirror your manufacturing production and automatically combine process and product data from every plant and supplier.
Sight Machine.Value Proposition Text: Make better decisions faster. Use your data.

Predikto.How It Works Text: Predikto provides actionable analytics solutions to improve visibility and equipment reliability of rail, aviation, and industrial fleets. Our machine learning SaaS engine connects the dots between equipment condition and existing sensor data to provide warnings of abnormal equipment health.
Predikto.Value Proposition Text: Predikto provides actionable analytics solutions to improve visibility and equipment reliability of rail, aviation, and industrial fleets. Our machine learning SaaS engine connects the dots between equipment condition and existing sensor data to provide warnings of abnormal equipment health

Turbo Monitoring.How It Works Text: Turbo Monitoring is a leading provider of independent turbine vibration condition monitoring and machinery diagnostics services for turbomachinery operators. Our vibration analysis and damage investigation services allow operators to reduce repairs costs and increase their machine availability by identifying damage early and avoiding unnecessary shutdowns.
Turbo Monitoring.Value Proposition Text: Providing independent and reliable condition monitoring services for turbomachinery operators.

DataRPM.How It Works Text: DataRPM delivers industry's only Cognitive Predictive Maintenance (CPdM) Platform for Industrial IoT. DataRPM uses patent pending Meta-Learning technology, integral component of Artificial Intelligence to automate predictions of asset failures. CPdM is a full stack platform available on cloud or on premises that connects to the data lake and then automatically runs multiple Machine Learning experiments, finds patterns & anomalies in data, identifies influencing factors & predictors, and builds an ensemble of predictive models to automate Predictive Maintenance. Not only does CPdM platform delivers descriptive, predictive, prescriptive analytics through Natural Language Discovery module but also provides a closed loop system by integrating these actionable insights through APIs to ERP, CRM, and CMS systems.
DataRPM.Value Proposition Text: DataRPM, the cognitive predictive maintenance leader,

GreyOrange.How It Works Text: With deep domain expertise, world class hardware and software engineering and the passion to solve complex business problems, the company is disrupting the way logistics and supply chain processes across the world are being optimized
GreyOrange.Value Proposition Text: Take your supply chain to the next level

Sarcos.How It Works Text: A quantum leap forward in unmanned ground vehicles.Conquer the world’s most complex and hazardous terrain and transmit data long-range without personal risk.A human-controlled,dual-armed extention safely lift sup 1000 pounds with precisely controlled and natural,real-time arm movements.
Sarcos.Value Proposition Text: Sarcos  has created dexterous robotic systems designed to master the world’s most dangerous and unpredictable environments.

Clearpath Robotics.How It Works Text: Provide inspired robotics solutions,world class support,and an incredible customer experience.
Clearpath Robotics.Value Proposition Text: Automate the world's dullest ,dirtiest,and deadliest jobs.

Fero Labs.How It Works Text: Fero takes care of the entire lifecycle of the models. Models are built and deployed in the factory systems. They are then continuously re-optimized with new data, and evaluated with the latest predictions.
Fero Labs.Value Proposition Text: Fero is a cutting-edge industrial machine learning platform. Fero supports a wide range of application areas and sectors.

Kindred.ai.How It Works Text: Kindred has been exploring and engineering systems that enable robots to understand and participate in our world, with the ultimate goal of enabling a future where intelligent machines work together with people to create abundance shared by all.
Kindred.ai.Value Proposition Text: The company’s central thesis is that human-like intelligence requires a human-like body

Arago.How It Works Text: HIRO™ learns through Knowledge Items (KI). KIs are atomic pieces of contextual information that store the experiences and best practices of experts. KIs feed HIRO™ with needed data to solve problems and enable the AI to combine KIs into different solutions. The number of possible permutations grows exponentially with added knowledge. Knowledge is 80% reused within organizations and 33% across organizations. Arago’s HIRO™ Community also provides a public library of thousands of KIs and KI bundles to kick-start a customer deployment. Furthermore, HIRO™ portal allows managers to analyze and improve their experts’ teaching verticals. A powerful semantic graph is at the core of the HIRO™ platform. HIRO™ Knowledge Core gives the power of a data pool, normally only available to internet giants, to established companies while fully retaining control, ownership and security of their data. While automating processes, the HIRO™ Knowledge Core builds an accessible semantic map of your organization’s data. This data map is organized semantically to allow understanding of the environment HIRO™ is working in. It serves as the foundation for the AI enablement of enterprises. Arago‘s algorithms enable the HIRO™ engine to perform dynamic reasoning to solve ambiguous and complex problems. This enables companies to become more agile as HIRO™ can quickly and seamlessly adapt to changes and system updates. Machine learning amplifies HIRO™ engine as it continuously optimizes performances.

Vicarious.How It Works Text: The ability to generalize from a few training examples is one of the hallmarks of human intelligence. This ability is required for robots to work effectively in a variety of environments without arduous reprogramming. Our algorithms learn models of the world that are then applied flexibly in a wide variety of situations. Our research emphasizes representations that enable task generality. Teaching robots new tasks becomes easy if they have a conceptual understanding of the world just like humans. We develop algorithms that can learn abstract concepts from sensorimotor experience. Underscoring our research strategy is the aim to discover the underlying properties of intelligence from neuroscience and cognitive science. We draw from the wealth of neuroscience literature to understand the representational structure and inductive biases that enable human brains to learn and generalize.

SAS.How It Works Text: Gain a consolidated view of quality across people, places and processes. In-depth knowledge of customer perceptions. And early detection of potential problems. Our manufacturing solutions include data mining and predictive analytics technologies that address:  Voice of the customer. Detect perceived quality and safety issues before they escalate. Big data integration. Get a single, comprehensive view of all quality-related data. Total cost of quality. Reduce scrap and rework. Predictive maintenance. Minimize unplanned downtime. Early issue warning. Quickly identify design and production defects before they become widespread.
SAS.Value Proposition Text: Innovate With Analytics  Conquer your challenges. SAS® Viya™ helps you collaborate – and get results faster.

Brain Corp.How It Works Text: Manufacturers integrate Brain Modules into their branded equipment. Customers purchase Brain-enabled equipment from manufacturers. Customers activate Brain Corp’s monthly service to automate their equipment.
Brain Corp.Value Proposition Text: Brain Corp's technology converts existing commercial equipment so that it can still be used by people as well as having the added benefit of being able to function autonomously, performing complex tasks without direct operator control. Brain Corp is a software technology company specializing in the development of software for intelligent and autonomous systems. Its A.I. technology represents the next generation of artificial brains for self-driving vehicles (SDVs) that are capable of operating in complex, indoor environments.

Infor.How It Works Text: Identify the customers through your data who are most likely to make a purchase and identify the products they are most likely to be interested in purchasing. This solution's functionality offers detailed information that would be difficult, if not impossible, to derive through traditional reporting. Unlike many solutions that are based on blindly adding customers to your sales funnel, Infor Sales Intelligence for CRM allows you to focus your efforts where they are most needed and differentiate your strategy based on where the customer is on the purchase continuum. Maximizing each relationship, the solution helps you create a relevant interaction with them based on their needs—increasing satisfaction and building loyalty. Free your resources to focus on value-add activities. With Infor Sales Intelligence for CRM, implementation doesn't require extensive configuration. The solution is easily installed and starts working immediately to provide relevant results.
Infor.Value Proposition Text: Infor is an enterprise software provider and strategic technology partner for more than 90,000 organizations worldwide. Our software is purpose-built for specific industries, providing complete suites that are designed to support progress – for individuals, for businesses, and across networks. We believe in the beauty of work, the importance of relationships, and the power of ideas to drive significant positive change. We  announced Coleman™ on Jul 11, 2017, an enterprise-grade, industry-specific AI platform for Infor CloudSuite™ applications.

Symphony Ventures.How It Works Text: Symphony defines RPA as any capability (software and services) that allows you to transact in any IT application or website, typically in the same way a human would, to automate complex, rule-based work. In other words, RPA software allows developers to tailor complex automations to a company’s processes. When an RPA robot is at work, it performs tasks just like a human would: logging in, operating applications, entering data, performing complex calculations and logging out. Because RPA is software-based, it can be used to perform various tasks. These include maintenance of records, queries, calculations, and transactions.
Symphony Ventures.Value Proposition Text: Software powering the Digital Labor revolution.

Blue Prism.How It Works Text:
Intelligent Digital Workforce Platform
One business-led, technology-controlled intelligent Digital Workforce platform to help you become a digital company, delivering human solutions and engaging customer experiences.

It takes more than one technology to become a digital enterprise. Easily build and deploy a Digital Workforce that securely connects to your staff, processes and systems — as well as best-in-class technologies to help you compete and grow.
Blue Prism.Value Proposition Text:
Blue Prism's Robotic Process Automation (RPA) software enables business operations to be agile and cost effective through rapid automation of manual, rules based, back office administrative processes, reducing cost and improving accuracy by creating a "digital workforce"​. 

The virtual workforce is built by the operational teams or accredited Blue Prism partners using our robotic automation technology to rapidly build and deploy automations through leveraging the presentation layer of existing enterprise applications. The automations are configured and managed within an IT governed framework and operating model which has been iteratively developed through numerous large scale and complex deployments.

Blue Prism's proven technology plays a key role in enabling organisations including; The Co-operative Banking Group, Shop Direct, RWE npower, Fidelity Investments, the NHS and O2 to rapidly respond to business change through agile back office operations.

RPA for the services industry is emerging as a major trend as discussed in The Economist, The New York Times and Forbes. Recently Blue Prism was also recognised by Gartner Group as a "Cool Vendor"​ :

Based in the UK, with offices in London, Manchester and Miami, Blue Prism was formed by a group of process automation experts in 2001. The company currently operates in the Financial Services, Energy, Telco, BPO and Healthcare sectors.

Cisco.How It Works Text: With predictive maintenance, Cisco is taking existing equipment or asset servicing  information and adding more information and more dependencies to make informed decisions.To protect your factory and build on the previously released Cisco Connected Factory Automation and Connected Factory Wireless solutions, the latest release of Connected Factory Security includes the following converged access security products, technologies, and services. Security Identity Services, Industrial DMZ, Network Address Translation (NAT), Connected Factory Starter Kit
Cisco.Value Proposition Text: We designed Cisco Connected Factory - Security to address the specific security risks of IoE deployments from a holistic perspective . The result is a solution that transforms diverse manufacturing processes into a unified, tightly integrated, and secure communication system, linking infrastructure, machines, processes and people.

Bosch.How It Works Text: Resistance spot welding involves a spot welder with copper-alloy electrode caps. The degree of wear on these caps plays a key role in the quality of spot welds. Electrode caps are typically maintained at fixed intervals: milled after a specified number of spot welds, and then replaced after a specified number of milling cycles. Caps tend to be replaced sooner than necessary to avoid quality issues.Thanks to suitable machine-learning algorithms, Data Analytics can use process data to help identify the optimum time for maintenance
Bosch.Value Proposition Text: Make maintenance measures efficient to reduce maintenance costs

General Electric (GE).How It Works Text: For more than 15 years, industry leaders have picked SmartSignal from GE Digital (formerly Proficy SmartSignal) to protect critical assets. With 45 U.S. patents/applications and continual innovation, SmartSignal keeps our customers on the leading edge. SmartSignal now monitors more than 15,000 assets worth approximately $37B. It identifies impending failures early and provides actionable notifications, reducing maintenance costs and damage to critical equipment and helping to keep operations safe and productive.
General Electric (GE).Value Proposition Text: By combining decades of experience building innovative industrial machines with cutting-edge data science and analytics expertise, GE is bringing the Industrial Internet to life by connecting minds and machines—to bring you better business results.

Augury.How It Works Text: Bring Predictive Maintenance to new markets.By listening to a machine they can tell if it is working properly,has a malfunction and even predict future failures.
Augury.Value Proposition Text: Augury brings internet-age technologies into the maintenance world and combines them with the gold-standard practices of Predictive Maintenance. Ideal for use in factories, commercial buildings and even homes, the platform enables facility owners and service companies to deploy quick, cost-efficient and scalable predictive maintenance strategies that reduce environmental impact, energy usage and operational costs.

OnviSource.How It Works Text: Automata is a Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solution that can capture and process repetitive actions such as filling out online forms, communicating with other systems, triggering actions or responses, and adapting to change or new situations. Automata can quickly assist with large volumes of business or customer transactions and is a perfect solution for front and back office employees that perform repetitive work.
OnviSource.Value Proposition Text: Processing large volumes of customer service requests and transactions in both contact centers and back offices, efficiently, cost effectively, and with no mistakes.

OpenConnect.How It Works Text: Whether your challenges relate to improving claims processing accuracy and efficiency, improving customer service, enforcing compliance, or reducing costs, OpenConnect’s AutoiQ™ process automation product is designed to automate routine tasks and workflows and improve first-pass efficiency. AutoiQ is the latest generation of OpenConnect automation software products that deliver value and benefits spanning multiple industries.
OpenConnect.Value Proposition Text: The speed, accuracy, and scalability that only true enterprise RPA can provide

Milvus Robotics.How It Works Text: SEIT was designed to be loaded with products on it, or simply pull a cart full of load. Therefore, this robotic system not only enhances the efficiency of work, but also reduces the operation costs of your transportation department. SEIT transports materials autonomously, by means of sensory capabilities and thereof, without any additional infrastructure cost. Robin is a smart service robot that provides an innovative, responsive and effective way of disseminating and transferring information. MRP2 is offered to the users ready for programming with advanced features which incorporates all the features that a researcher can expect from a mobile robot platform.
Milvus Robotics.Value Proposition Text: Automate your material transport duties with our autonomous mobile robots

Softomotive.Value Proposition Text: Softomotive RPA Technology Solutions support real-life, large-scale, enterprise process automation, and are well-known for their ease of deployment and intuitiveness - a powerful combination that allows rapid RPA penetration and adoption.

C2RO Cloud Robotics.How It Works Text: C2RO allows Robot Manufacturers to significantly augment the capability of their robot offerings by offloading computationally expensive functions to the cloud. Using a centralized processing platform also allows operators to combine robotics services and enable collaboration between multiple robots as well as robots and external sensors such as cameras.
C2RO Cloud Robotics.Value Proposition Text: C2RO allows Robot Manufacturers to significantly augment the capability of their robot offerings by offloading computationally expensive functions to the cloud. Using a centralized processing platform also allows operators to combine robotics services and enable collaboration between multiple robots as well as robots and external sensors.

vPhrase Analytics Solutions Pvt. Ltd..How It Works Text: Phrazor, analyses data, derives insights and then communicates those insights, in words, in multiple languages. It uses Natural Language Generation to create text based insights.
vPhrase Analytics Solutions Pvt. Ltd..Value Proposition Text: vPhrase's AI product Phrazor summarises data into a few bullet points. These bullet points highlight the key insights you need for decision making. With Phrazor, you don't have to spend time in analysing numbers or interpreting dashboards, you get your insights ready-made. Enterprises use Phrazor to personalise and add deep insights to the reports they send to their customers and team members.

SparkCognition.How It Works Text: SparkCognition provides a suite of AI-powered solutions in cognitive anti-malware, condition-based monitoring, predictive and prescriptive analytics, and natural language processing. SparkPredict uses automated development of neural networks to discern patterns in collected sensor data, and then derive real-time analytics. DeepArmor uses machine learning to develop patterns of identification for static file analysis, enabling it to classify files that it has never seen before, enabling the detection of polymorphic (old files that have been changed) and zero-day (completely new) threats. DeepNLP uses natural language processing and deep learning techniques to provide a solution capable of unlocking a vast wealth of valuable information.
SparkCognition.Value Proposition Text: SparkCognition is an artificial intelligence technology leader deploying intelligent software for the safety, security, and reliability of the Industrial Internet. The company’s technology is capable of harnessing real time sensor data and learning from it continuously, allowing for more accurate risk mitigation and prevention policies to intervene and avert disasters; and for optimization of critical system.

0.Title: Nordea
0.Long Description: With Trifacta’s interactive discovery and predictive transformation capabilities, Nordea can now quickly identify the contents of each data source and cleanse data quickly. Because Trifacta has been built from the ground up to be optimized for Hadoop and big data, transforming massive amounts of multi-structured data was fast, easy, and secure. Trifacta allows the business analyst team to prepare data themselves before using it for analysis. This frees up the IT team to concentrate on data acquisition, compliance, security and governance. The additional flexibility that Trifacta provides empowers analysts to blend and correlate diverse data sets, responding quickly to constantly changing reporting requirements and evolving data sources.

1.Title: GoPro
1.Long Description: In the wake of GoPro’s IPO, the company is expanding its product line and increasing its offering of apps, software and media channels. One of the most critical challenges facing GoPro during this time of rapid growth and expansion is their ability to make effective use of the massive amounts of data the company is inundated with generated by devices, content networks, retail sales, social media and other channels. Trifacta enables GoPro’s analysts to profile and explore the variety of data landing in Hadoop to see how the different sources can be leveraged and transformed for analytic purposes.

2.Title: Royal Bank of Scotland
2.Long Description: Using Trifacta, the Royal Bank of Scotland has dramatically increased its visibility of customer activity to improve customer service, thus satisfaction. With a better understanding of topics that customers want addressed, they can more effectively train their chat agents and based upon real customer feedback they create more effective service and product propositions.

3.Title: PepsiCo
3.Long Description: With Trifacta, PepsiCo has streamlined its process, dramatically reducing the time spent on data preparation and the overall quality of the prepared data used in analysis. Now the reports run directly on Hadoop (without involving multiple Access and PepsiCo servers), enabling analysts to directly manipulate data using Trifacta and publish the prepared data sets to Tableau for visualization and broader consumption.

4.Title: Zurich Insurance
4.Long Description: Trifacta allows Zurich’s team to more quickly explore and transform new data sources to define how they can be used to enrich risk calculations. Incorporating new data into risk assessment gives Zurich a competitive advantage over other insurers.

5.Title: Orange
5.Long Description: What had previously taken months, the Orange team now accomplished in a matter of hours. As a company with huge quantities of data, such as one billion incoming call detail records each day, the ability to wrangle data at an incredible speed was a game changer. This increased productivity broadened the possibilities of what Orange could do with its data. Now, Orange can leverage the diverse data available to them, including usage data, network data and billing data to make improvements in sales, product development, marketing and customer service, thus improving brand loyalty, topline growth and reducing overall cost.

0.Title: Ernst & Young
0.Long Description: Global professional services firm EY has today been revealed as our first certified implementer. Having recently completed the PypePro Implementation Training Program, EY firms are now equipped to implement and integrate our solution, train customers on user-onboarding, inform messaging strategies and support existing customers about our technology and services.  EY PYPEPRO CERTIFICATION The PypePro program takes our enterprise clients through a rigorous six-phase plan to transform their business for the on-demand economy. The EY certification covered a comprehensive breakdown of Pypestream’s solution including the smart messaging platform, sales and user onboarding strategies, reporting and analytics, system integrations, and process automation via AI and chatbots. EY will now work to bring Pypestream’s customer engagement solution to a vast network of clients and customers while providing the global horsepower and expertise to quickly and efficiently scale the Pypestream platform.  “Intelligent messaging is moving from insurance customer service to core operational functions,” said David Connolly, the EY Global Digital Insurance Leader. “Pypestream can provide a secure and user-friendly means to gather essential information allowing insurance policies to be issued, bills to be paid and claims settled without the involvement of insurance company representatives or agents.”  Building on the success of EY’s initial certification, Pypestream is rolling out the implementation program to train enterprises in additional verticals and educate additional businesses about the benefits of their solution.  6 Phases of PypePro Certification:  1.  MATRIX: Business use-cases are identified and measured against a set of specific metrics and ranked in matrix based on priority level.  2. EMPOWER: Comprehensive training is provided for all of our products and services, along with a detailed overview of messaging best practices.  3. ENGAGE: Educational initiatives such as onboarding videos and emails, social media posts, web graphics, web campaigns and IVR language are delivered to drive end-user adoption.  4. PYPEBOT DESIGN: User personas inform the design of each customized PypeBot, while our proprietary NLP accentuates the quality of the end-user’s experience. The results: smart messaging for the highest volume inquiries, and increased Net Promoter Scores.  5. ANALYTICS: Data analysis is fully facilitated for all bot interactions and actionable recommendations are provided to continually improve engagement.  6. INTEGRATIONS: All integrations with existing back-end data systems are executed on the client’s behalf using APIs. Full requirements definition and documentation is provided to empower bots and agents with transactional capabilities, all through an omnichannel experience for end-users.  PYPESTREAM FOR THE INSURANCE INDUSTRY Pypestream provides a complete SaaS solution to insurance companies and enterprises that enables real-time customer service, secure in-message billing and payments, and business process transformation. The simplified, three-step transformation results in on-demand connectivity across all devices between the consumer and the insurance provider. We do this by leveraging smart messaging, intuitive user experiences, and automation via chatbots and AI.  “Pypestream’s customer engagement solution is just the beginning of trend we’re seeing industry-wide to implement smart, secure messaging strategies to meet customers where they are,” said Dave Dias, founder and chairman of Insurance Thought Leadership.

Pypestream.How It Works Text: Our Smart Messaging Platform is purpose-built for the enterprise and uses a patented framework to separate communication into topic-specific channels. Key features include: Secure and compliant-by-design: data on Pypestream is protected with end-to-end encryption and remains the property of the enterprise. In-message payments: securely transact with customers within the messaging stream. Multimedia support: send PDFs, images, and videos for rich messaging experiences. Back-end integrations: pull customer data into the Pypestream platform through your existing CMS and CRM systems. Automation-enabled: seamlessly deploy chatbots to automate the messaging experience.
Pypestream.Value Proposition Text: PYPESTREAM IS AN ENTERPRISE-GRADE, SECURE AND COMPLIANT ENGAGEMENT SOLUTION PURPOSE-BUILT FOR BUSINESS

Maintaining this exceptional level of personalized, dedicated customer service that was passed on for over six decades became more of a challenge as the company grew. 0.Title: JWT
0.Long Description:
Pangaea is an internal AI solution that allows anyone in its global network to ask questions and get answers from any of their 12,000+ colleagues around the world. Built by J. Walter Thompson Worldwide, Mirum, and Swiss AI specialist Starmind, Pangaea puts together neuroscience and AI development in a self-learning network that helps employees unlock the vast knowledge that exists within the network.

Employees can ask any question on the platform anonymously – whether it’s about a campaign, a client, a sales lead, or even the best place to host a business lunch. As employees respond, Pangaea logs and rates the quality of the answers. Learning who is best equipped to tackle certain questions and what existing answers offer the best solution, Pangaea provides faster and more accurate solutions for similar questions that may be posed in the future. 

Pangaea resolves an inevitable organizational challenge that many large networks face: knowing whom to turn to when you have a question that your typical channels cannot answer. The AI connects users to the people they need to know to answer their questions rather than replacing human connection with tech.

https://creativepool.com/magazine/advertising/j--walter-thompson-join-the-ai-race-with-pangaea.15576
