TopOPPS.Value Proposition Text: TopOPPS assists the sales reps with easy pipeline updates and guided winning behaviors that result in CRM hygiene with accurate analytics and predictive sales forecasts.

Xactly.How It Works Text: "Incentives: The commission plan is the most effective message about what the company wants from the sales team. The commission check is the most effective way to tell the sales rep to do it again. Express: Xactly Express gives emerging companies the tools they need to build and manage successful incentive compensation plans that drive sales results and inspire performance. Objectives: Your employees are your company’s most important asset, so everyone benefits when you create cohesive, motivating bonus and incentive plans. Insights: Xactly helps you take incentive compensation from a dark art to a science, providing you with Insights to help you tap the motivational power of your incentive compensation and inspire employee performance."
Xactly.Value Proposition Text: Solutions for Every Phase of the Sales Compensation Lifecycle

Optymyze.How It Works Text: Optymyze transforms data into excellence in sales performance. By seamlessly combining the power of data with the capabilities of the apps in our sales compensation, sales operations, sales people, and sales financials packages, we transform our customers’ sales performance outcomes.
Optymyze.Value Proposition Text: "Optymyze Advances its Leader Position in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for Sales Performance"

LatentView Analytics.How It Works Text: Our impressive client retention rates and long-term relationships give us the confidence to invest early in understanding our clients’ business goals and challenges. LatentView’s customized roadmap is designed to move clients across the analytics maturity quadrant, allowing us to grow with our customers as their digital acumen increases. By setting up Centers of Excellence (CoE) we are able to demonstrate significant ROI on analytics spend from day one. At LatentView, we believe that Business + Data + Math = Actionable Insights. SolveIt is an automated platform that enables financial institutions to easily calculate Customer Lifetime Value (CLV), as well as profitability of various segments. It allows for behavioral segmentation and has advanced forecasting capabilities, going beyond the traditional statistic measures of existing tools.
LatentView Analytics.Value Proposition Text: We help companies drive digital transformation by helping them combine digital and traditional data to gain a competitive advantage. LatentView provides a 360-degree view of the digital consumer, enabling companies to predict new revenue streams, anticipate product trends and popularity, improve customer retention rates and optimize investment decisions.

BRIDGEi2i Analytics Solutions.How It Works Text: SAC deploys sales analytics capabilities, frameworks and tools seamlessly on your CRM data to generate rich actionable insights that help sales organizations measure, analyse and optimize sales performance comprehensively. SAC focuses on both direct and indirect (channel) sales and has three key components to it; SAC for Sales strategy and Planning, SAC for Sales Operations and SAC for Channel Effectiveness.
BRIDGEi2i Analytics Solutions.Value Proposition Text: BRIDGEi2i’s Sales Analytics Solution, Sales Acceleration Centre helps Sales Organizations drive accelerated growth by transforming sales data to insights that drive informed sales decisions and actionable outcomes. SAC leverages advanced proprietary predictive algorithms, frameworks and technology to deliver fast and assured results.

GrowthIntel.How It Works Text: UNDERSTANDING YOUR BEST CUSTOMERS GrowthIntel analyses open, unstructured data related to your best customers and derives a set of signals that are strong indicators of a good prospect for your business. FINDING MORE JUST LIKE THEM It then examines our live dataset of every company in the UK, to identify companies exhibiting similar signals and rank them according to the strength of those signals. SHOWING YOU YOUR INVISIBLE MARKET The result? Brand new in-market prospects that you won’t find any other way. Every company is ranked A, B, C or D, indicating their likelihood to convert.
GrowthIntel.Value Proposition Text: GrowthIntel identifies every company with a requirement for your product or service, and prioritises them according to the strength of that requirement.

Semantic Machines.How It Works Text: Semantic Machines is made up of a team of proven researchers, engineers and entrepreneurs with extensive track records in AI development. Our team has unique experience, building core AI technology for Siri and Google Now as well as leading award-winning academic research. Collectively, we have made pioneering contributions to natural language processing, speech recognition, speech synthesis, deep learning, semantic understanding, machine learning and linguistics.
Semantic Machines.Value Proposition Text: Semantic Machines is developing the fundamental AI technology needed to make conversational computing a reality.

BrightTarget.How It Works Text: LOAD YOUR DATA Load your Customer and Transaction data using our pre-build cloud connectors or standard flat-file API ENRICH & CLEANSE BrightTarget automatically enriches & cleanses your data against our external data and signals PREDICT THE FUTURE BrightTarget analyses your data running powerful out-of-the-box predictive models ANALYSE THE RESULTS Gain new insights through pre-build Analytics designed specifically for Marketers TAKE ACTION Feed data and insight into your CRM or Marketing Automation System to take action
BrightTarget.Value Proposition Text: The Predictive Software for B2B Sales & Marketing Professionals to understand, retain, grow and acquire more valuable customers. OR. BrightTarget helps you optimise your Sales & Marketing activities across the entire sales funnel. Acquire better leads, close more of them and with less effort.

Kore.ai.How It Works Text: Using our Bots Platform, we’ve created a family of intelligent virtual assistants that give enterprises a first-mover advantage and instantly add value to industries and functions like sales, service, IT Help Desk, retail banking and commerce.  These chatbots are ready to be branded, designed for rapid deployment, and easily extended for company-specific needs – now and in the future.
Kore.ai.Value Proposition Text: Kore.ai facilitates intelligent dialogs between people and systems so getting tasks done is as fast and simple as sending a text.

Datanyze.How It Works Text: "TECHNOLOGY TRACKING: Identify new targets for your reps every day by seeing which prospects just added or dropped a particular technology provider. PROSPECTING: Research accounts, find contacts and add to outbound tools like Outreach, SalesLoft and PersistIQ in one easy workflow. InsightSquared.How It Works Text: InsightSquared’s predictive models consider several factors – from historical patterns and current sales pipeline to average deal size, past rep performance and time-in-stage. Learn more about how LeanData takes the mystery out of routing with a first-of-its-kind visual representation of your lead flow. Matching: You can uncover the hidden connections in your Salesforce database with LeanData’s best-in-class fuzzy matching. Explore how matching ensures visibility into all activity within accounts. Attribution and Reporting: LeanData allows you to trust your data again. Learn how LeanData’s Marketing Touch Object gives marketers an accurate picture of their database by creating a link between previously unconnected data within Salesforce.
LeanData.Value Proposition Text: The role of Sales Operations is expanding as organizations become more data-driven.  Stay current in a fast-changing world where Sales Ops professionals are building high-performing  processes designed to scale.

Cogito.How It Works Text: CLOSE MORE BUSINESS  In-call guidance presents speaking cues to reps to help them build deeper emotional connections. INCREASE EFFICIENCY  Instant insight into a prospect’s perception helps reps know when to go for the close or move on. GAIN UNRIVALED INSIGHT Leaders automatically receive feedback on rep effectiveness and customer experience on every call. IMPROVE CONTINUOUSLY Predictive models reveal the behavioral patterns that lead to higher performance.
Cogito.Value Proposition Text: A SMARTER WAY TO SELL Real-Time emotional Intelligence helps make every sales call a win

RainKing.How It Works Text: Think about your top clients - what do they have in common? Enterprise or mid-size business? Are they in a certain industry? What technologies do they use? Build your ideal buyer persona in RainKing and let our software analyze and surface quality prospects, ranked by their likeliness to buy. No more wasting time with lower-level gate keepers or individual contributors. RainKing effectively shortens your sales cycle by showing you who to target and when. It's lead generation made easy.

Speed To Contact.How It Works Text: Real-Time Response: Trigger a welcome text for every new incoming lead, from any source. Pass contact information and a number to call your company back. If you can’t reach the lead by phone, you can often start a dialogue using text messaging. Lead Status: Send customized text messages based your lead’s status or results of a call. For example, if a lead requests information, you could send a link to a document by simply marking the lead’s status as “Send Info”. Drip Intervals: Send text messages to leads using your preferred intervals. For example, send a text after 5 hours, and if there’s no response, send another a week later, and another two weeks after that.

hybris.How It Works Text: In the digital economy, customers expect personalized experiences on every channel. Anything less risks being dismissed as noise. Businesses need to understand the customer context: what customers have already done, what they're doing right now, and what they are likely to do in the future. Without this, marketers cannot anticipate or meet the needs of their audience. Discover new opportunities with real-time lead scoring. This shows you which leads are more likely to close successfully, with each one given a number based on similar opportunities that have led to a sale in the past. The higher the number, the higher the chance of success.
hybris.Value Proposition Text: SAP Hybris gets your business where it needs to be.

ContactUs.com.How It Works Text: Use unique urls to track every web lead to a specific lead source and campaign Use unique phone numbers to track every phone lead to a specific lead source and campaign Record and replay all inbound phone calls on your tracked phone numbers Track campaign performance metrics

Close.io.How It Works Text: Manage your workflow Close.io gives you an overview of all your sales activities. Emails, calls, voicemails, tasks and reminders are automatically organized so that you always know what’s going on and what you should do next. Stay on top of your pipeline Inbox shows you the items that need attention. Once you complete a task or return a missed call, they will disappear from the list. Everything you do in Close.io is synced to Inbox, making sure you’re on top of your pipeline.
Close.io.Value Proposition Text: Calls, emails, reminders, tasks — Inbox keeps track of all your sales activities, making your workflow better and faster than ever before.

Bananatag.How It Works Text: Bananatag integrates directly with your Gmail or Outlook, allowing you to add our powerful features without needing to change existing workflows. It's as simple as checking a box to track emails right from your compose window.
Bananatag.Value Proposition Text: Email is a black hole Your sales team sends hundreds of outbound emails every week. Some leads respond, most don’t. Sales reps try different strategies but it’s impossible to fully understand what works. So what’s the answer?

Recast.AI.How It Works Text:
"Recast.AI is the collaborative end-to-end bot platform for developers. 
By developing a powerful natural language processing (NLP) technology and putting it at the disposal of developers through a collaborative end-to-end bot platform, we make bot building simple, quick and very efficient. With all necessary tools to build, train, connect & monitor chatbots, developers can easily create very powerful conversation interfaces. Our platform is collaborative, allowing our 25,000+ users to fork bots, share their bot skills and work collaboratively. "
Recast.AI.Value Proposition Text:
"Recast.AI is the collaborative end-to-end bot platform for developers.
The strengh of Recast.AI comes from three main pillars: technology, bot building and community. 
Firstly, we are developing a strong and powerful natural language processing (NLP) technology. This technology, based on deep learning, allows our users to analyse sentences, detect their intent (classification) and extract key information called entities (named entity recognition or NER). Recast.AI provides by default an extensive enrichment of 35+ entities such as location, datetimes or temperatures. To this we've also added emoji support, sentiment analysis, dialog management or expression suggestions, leveraging data augmentation to drastically fasten bot building. This NLP technology allows the creation of chatbots in any language, from English to Hebrew through Japanese. 
Second, bot building is done through our free platform. In this platform, we've developed a complete suite of tools for bot building. Developers can train their bot, build their conversational flow in a visual builder (using our unique Bot Skills technology), connect bots to any channel in a few clicks (Messenger, Slack, Kik, Skype, etc) and monitor its use. All of this for free.
Finally, from the beginning, Recast.AI has been a collaborative platform. Today, more than 25,000 developers use our technology and tools. Bots built on Recast.AI can be forked, Bot Skills can be shared, and you can work collaboratively on a bot. The community also exchanges tips and tricks on our Slack Community.

While our technology is used by developers all around the world, we also work closely with major corporations to automate their customer supports with chatbots. 

With Recast.AI, you have all tools necessary to the building of powerful bots and can provide great conversational interfaces in a heartbeat. "

Protagonist.How It Works Text: Protagonist uses AI to gather and analyze millions of data points across the web to uncover the narratives, or deeply held beliefs that drive human behavior. Understanding the volume and importance of content, it's influencers, relevant channels, and the sentiment of beliefs is possible via the Protagonist platform through natural language processing and deep learning.
Protagonist.Value Proposition Text: Protagonist identifies, measures, and provides strategies for taking control of  narratives–the deeply held beliefs that drive human behavior–which are essential to customer engagement. Artificial intelligence via the Protagonist platform enables marketers to gather, analyze, and utilize millions of data points to create messages that resonate with customers, delivering empathy at scale. This was previously impossible without the power of Narrative Analytics.

Personali.Head Quarter: New York, New York, United States

Pat's meaning platform is suitable for language based applications of the future such as Language Learning, Home Automation, Chatbots, Intelligent Assistants andText Analytics.

Personalization module is powered by state-of-art recommendation algorithm, which is mainly developed by Murat Soysal during his PhD studies. Most important difference of Segmentify's approach is converting bulk and batch processing based current approaches to a real-time approach which is more flexible to changes in trends

0.Title: Nordea
0.Long Description: With Trifacta’s interactive discovery and predictive transformation capabilities, Nordea can now quickly identify the contents of each data source and cleanse data quickly. Because Trifacta has been built from the ground up to be optimized for Hadoop and big data, transforming massive amounts of multi-structured data was fast, easy, and secure. Trifacta allows the business analyst team to prepare data themselves before using it for analysis. This frees up the IT team to concentrate on data acquisition, compliance, security and governance. The additional flexibility that Trifacta provides empowers analysts to blend and correlate diverse data sets, responding quickly to constantly changing reporting requirements and evolving data sources.

1.Title: GoPro
1.Long Description: In the wake of GoPro’s IPO, the company is expanding its product line and increasing its offering of apps, software and media channels. One of the most critical challenges facing GoPro during this time of rapid growth and expansion is their ability to make effective use of the massive amounts of data the company is inundated with generated by devices, content networks, retail sales, social media and other channels. Trifacta enables GoPro’s analysts to profile and explore the variety of data landing in Hadoop to see how the different sources can be leveraged and transformed for analytic purposes.

2.Title: Royal Bank of Scotland
2.Long Description: Using Trifacta, the Royal Bank of Scotland has dramatically increased its visibility of customer activity to improve customer service, thus satisfaction. With a better understanding of topics that customers want addressed, they can more effectively train their chat agents and based upon real customer feedback they create more effective service and product propositions.

3.Title: PepsiCo
3.Long Description: With Trifacta, PepsiCo has streamlined its process, dramatically reducing the time spent on data preparation and the overall quality of the prepared data used in analysis. Now the reports run directly on Hadoop (without involving multiple Access and PepsiCo servers), enabling analysts to directly manipulate data using Trifacta and publish the prepared data sets to Tableau for visualization and broader consumption.

4.Title: Zurich Insurance
4.Long Description: Trifacta allows Zurich’s team to more quickly explore and transform new data sources to define how they can be used to enrich risk calculations. Incorporating new data into risk assessment gives Zurich a competitive advantage over other insurers.

5.Title: Orange
5.Long Description: What had previously taken months, the Orange team now accomplished in a matter of hours. As a company with huge quantities of data, such as one billion incoming call detail records each day, the ability to wrangle data at an incredible speed was a game changer. This increased productivity broadened the possibilities of what Orange could do with its data. Now, Orange can leverage the diverse data available to them, including usage data, network data and billing data to make improvements in sales, product development, marketing and customer service, thus improving brand loyalty, topline growth and reducing overall cost.

Trifacta.How It Works Text: Trifacta provides data wrangling solutions for companies to enables better analysis and the opportunity to reshape data according to customer needs.
Trifacta.Value Proposition Text: Trifacta’s mission is to create radical productivity for people who analyze data. We are deeply focused on solving for the biggest bottleneck in the data lifecycle, data wrangling, by making it more intuitive and efficient for anyone who works with data.

CrossChx, Inc..How It Works Text: Like any new employee, our AI solution Olive receives an email address and user access for the tools and systems you already have in place. This means no integrations, no training, and no additional workflows. By granting the same user access you give your team, Olive can use any EHR, task management, and payment system, providing true interoperability.
CrossChx, Inc..Value Proposition Text: We believe that Olive is the tool that will finally help healthcare facilities use their human employees to their fullest potential. By automating mundane, repetitive tasks that are already prone to human error, Olive allows staff to focus on patient care and human interaction. We also believe that opportunity to “scale humans” exists outside of healthcare—in fact, in every industry. To “scale humans,” a company can use AI as a tool to automate their own repetitive processes, thus creating their own “digital workforce.” This digital workforce works side-by-side with human employees, who can then focus on tasks that require critical thinking, creativity, and human judgement.

import.io.How It Works Text: Import.io delivers a SaaS product that enables users to convert the mass of data on websites into structured, machine readable data with no coding required. import.io.Value Proposition Text: 4.5 billion pages of the world's data exists on the internet, harness it with Import.io. Effective use of data can provide incredible efficiency and value to almost any business, from the smallest independent company to the largest multi-national. It can also advance education, academic research, charitable work, investigative journalism and many other efforts that help to make our world a better place.

Ayehu.How It Works Text: Ayehu acts as a force multiplier, driving efficiency through a simple and powerful IT automation and orchestration platform powered by AI. The next generation automation platform helps enterprises save time on manual and repetitive tasks, accelerate mean time to resolution (MTTR), and maintain greater control over IT infrastructure.IT and security operations teams can fully- or semi-automate the manual response of an experienced IT or security operator/analyst, including complex tasks across multiple, disparate systems. Ayehu’s response time is instant and automatic, executing pre-configured instructions without any programming required, helping to resolve virtually any alert, incident or crisis.
Ayehu.Value Proposition Text: Ayehu is the IT Automation and Orchestration platform built for the Digital Era. Powered by machine learning algorithms, it acts as a force multiplier for IT operations, security operations, managed service providers (MSPs) and managed security service providers (MSSPs). Customers can significantly save time on manual and repetitive tasks, respond to incidents with pinpoint accuracy, accelerate mean time to resolution, and maintain greater control over IT infrastructure.

0.Title: Fareboom
0.Long Description:
Background
Fareboom.com is a project by Best Travel Store Inc., a US-based online travel agency. It has been developed by the AltexSoft team in order to substitute an older version of the company’s booking service.

One of the major product updates that needed to be delivered by our team was Fareboom Price Predictor. The goal was to implement an innovative fare forecast feature on top of the company’s existing travel booking engine. Price Predictor had to complement the core search functionality and help users make better purchasing decisions. It needed to be designed for the price sensitive customer to target the best possible time to buy an airline ticket over several months.

Business Challenges
Since Microsoft withdrew its Bing flight predictor feature from the Travel portal in 2014, major market players have been trying to take its place. While other services, such as Kayak fare predictor and Skyscanner, offer similar fare movement forecast options, the niche is still highly competitive as there is always room for improvement.

Armed with 10+ years of experience in the travel industry, our client has decided to enter the competition in order to provide users with better customer service and more price saving opportunities. The goal was to build an intelligent algorithm, able to forecast future price movements based on historical data and smart predictive analytics models.

The project consisted of several tasks:

In-depth research and historical data analysis
Prediction algorithm development and enhancements
User experience and performance optimization
Value Delivered
Similar to Bing travel predictor, the Fareboom Price Predictor is aimed at helping users make informed decisions as to when to buy tickets or how long to wait to get the best flight deals. In order to provide the expected project results, our team delivered the following milestones:

Uncovering the Hidden Patterns in Large Dataset
To be able to predict the future price movements, our data scientists studied the historical data about airfare trend changes over the past several years. The actual information from millions of searches, processed by the Fareboom search engine was used, to make the predictions highly reliable. In order to increase the amount of data and statistical power, we handled neighbor travel dates data and clever merging algorithms to form the time series for further forecasting. Employing advanced data mining and aggregation techniques, the team was able to understand and visualize the hidden patterns.

Predicting the Future Price Movements with High Confidence
Based on discovered patterns, the team formed algorithm models with different parameters. The info about actual flight fares helped us find the most suitable prediction algorithm: Setting the system parameters of the recent past, our data scientist ran the algorithm to predict the fares we already knew. Thus, we were able to validate or disprove the hypothesis based on exact information. The final algorithm has an average confidence rate of 75% and uses a time series forecasting to make both long-term (7 weeks) and short-term (7 days) predictions. The algorithm is constantly being improved through machine learning techniques, based on the factual information about the confirmed and disproved predictions.

Seamless Price Predictor Integration and Optimized Experience
The Price Predictor feature is integrated into the existing fare search functionality and is shown to a certain segment of the Fareboom users (currently about 20%). Being displayed in a form of a search module and a popup window, it is sure to grasp the user’s attention and allows for a multitude of interactions (e.g. Close Popup, See More) and events (e.g. scroll, hover over, etc.). Therefore, we can track multiple stats and adjust the user experience based on them. For example, we have found that Price Predictor has doubled the average time per session within a month since the release and continues to grow the conversion.

LARI.How It Works Text:
We create an efficient and effective method to identify which laws, regulations and rules have changed. We group these changes into groups and contexts that are relevant to our customers and show the relationships between regulations. This way, the impact that a change can have on the company can be recognized and tracked.
 
LARI collects data on the use of the system, in order to be able to predict trends, overlapping contexts and improve its services. It is a self-learning system.
LARI.Value Proposition Text: LARI is a SaaS that collects this information and provides clear, comprehensive, structured, and actionable reporting on regulatory and legal changes.

0.Long Description:
Morrisons Solicitors is a leading law firm in the south east of England. Founded nearly 300 years ago, Morrisons provides an integrated commercial service to clients ranging from blue-chip corporates to SMEs, OMBs and family-run businesses. The firm also offers a full range of services to private individuals, including family, residential conveyancing, wills, estates and tax planning, probate, personal injury and clinical negligence.
Due to the nature of its work, Morrisons deals with highly sensitive information on a daily basis. The firm realised that there was a real risk that this sensitive information could be accidentally sent the wrong person. After evaluating the potential consequences of such a breach, they sought CheckRecipient’s solution to intelligently prevent misaddressed emails.

CheckRecipient.How It Works Text: Guardian analyses millions of data points across the entire email network of an organisation. From this unstructured information, Guardian categorises and maps key data relationships. Guardian applies data science and machine learning algorithms to detect patterns of behaviour and anomalies across the network. Guardian’s machine learning algorithms analyse historical email data to learn typical sending patterns and behaviours. Guardian then analyses the content of all outbound emails and detects any anomalies. If an anomaly is detected, Guardian will temporarily stop the email from being sent and display a notification to the sender.
CheckRecipient.Value Proposition Text: By design, email is an open door to your organisation’s network and is highly prone to human error and insider threats. CheckRecipient uses machine learning to apply automatic protection without any behaviour change for employees.

Ayasdi.How It Works Text: Artificial intelligence seeks to give computers capabilities that in some cases mimic human ability, and in others far surpass our capabilities. Computers are able to ingest large and complex data sets and do what humans are incapable of, which is to make sense of all possible relationships amongst that data, in a reasonable amount of time. This is true even when the data involved is massive– imagine trying to make sense of a spreadsheet with billions of rows or a hundred thousand columns. Humans don’t even know where to begin.  The industrial revolution in the early 19th century caused a shift in human capabilities. Machines improved the quality of what could be manufactured, increased workforce productivity, replaced unskilled human labor, and enabled the development of new products that were far beyond the capabilities of humans to produce. AI is rapidly creating a parallel revolution, but this time for knowledge-based processes instead of physical processes, and for white-collar workers instead of factory employees.  The collection and analysis of data from transactions, sensors, and biometrics continues to grow at a prodigious rate, taxing the analytic capabilities of even the most sophisticated organizations. The quantity of possible insights in a given dataset is an exponential function of the number of data points. On top of this, aggregate data growth is an exponential function with time. Unfortunately, the world cannot train enough data scientists to meet this runaway, double-exponential demand curve for analytics.  This dynamic is driving computer scientists and mathematicians alike to examine new approaches to interact with big and high dimensional data.  Today’s hypothesis-driven analytics and manual machine learning algorithms and statistical tools will not suffice. High-performance computers and algorithms can examine big and complex data far faster and seek insights more comprehensively than any human is capable of.   Ayasdi's core technology innovation is our development of artificial intelligence platform that automatically selects and combines multiple machine learning, statistical and geometric algorithms to solve real-world business problems.  Applications deployed with Ayasdi demonstrate characteristics of intelligence.  They discover information that is latent in big and/or high dimensional data, they learn and predict the future with high accuracy as well as improve over time with experience, they justify their actions, predictions and discoveries in a transparent and statistically proven fashion and they can act based on data, recommend actions to humans, and can react to changes.
Ayasdi.Value Proposition Text: Our Vision  At Ayasdi, we believe that deriving insight from big data will become essential and transformative for every enterprise. We believe that machine intelligence has the ability to revolutionize industries, allowing businesses to scale with algorithms and raw computing power rather than people, drastically improving human productivity, increasing operational effectiveness, and advancing scientific discovery.

Onfido’s background checks are based on hard data — turning the art of trust into a science — so that you and your users can make confident, informed decisions on the people with whom you interact.
Onfido.Value Proposition Text: Onfido delivers next-generation background checks, helping businesses across the world verify anyone, anywhere.  Powered by machine-learning technology, Onfido is the solution of choice for businesses seeking to verify identities and carry out adverse history searches at scale.

0.Title: J&B Medical Supplies
0.Long Description: J&B Medical Supplies distributes medical and surgical products to patients, caregivers, health systems, clinics, and first responders. Watch as Sr. Customer Service Manager Barbara Serra describes the excellent working relationship and strategic thinking that SmartAction has brought to her customer service team.

1.Title: TechStyle Fashion Group
1.Long Description: When TechStyle Fashion Group (JustFab, Fabletics, ShoeDazzle, Fabkids) needed powerful AI to fine tune their customer experience and bring down overhead, they turned to SmartAction. Watch Justin Borah, VP Global Member Services Support Operations, discuss how SmartAction helped them.

2.Title: Fidelity Communications
2.Long Description:
Fidelity Communications VP Of Customer Care, John Walburn, took a few minutes at Call Center Week 2016 to discuss why Fidelity chose to work with SmartAction and the positive impact it’s had on their business.

Fidelity started working with SmartAction to address issues with payments that their customers were facing. With the help of SmartAction Fidelity has been able to solve the issue at hand and in turn obtain great CSAT results. Watch the video to hear John discuss the working relationship with SmartAction and the results they’ve gotten since implementing the technology.

3.Title: Penske Truck Rental
3.Long Description: Penske Truck Rental is able to send intelligent, 100% Natural Language outbound SMS texts to confirm upcoming rentals. If any information is incorrect, or the customer needs to change reservation information, the bot can dynamically make changes or reschedule within the same text thread.

SmartAction.How It Works Text: Our cloud-based platform is built for enterprises to satisfy growing expectations for self-service. We focus on building an environment where intelligent virtual agents are handling complex customer requests in every medium – voice, SMS text, chat, social media, and mobile. This leaves call center agents with time to focus on more meaningful, human-only conversations. It is our goal to fundamentally improve the way customers communicate with the brands they love.
SmartAction.Value Proposition Text: SmartAction offers leading AI technology, used to automate customer service transactions for enterprises. The company was founded as a voice self-service company, but now provides self-service in every customer experience channel - web chat, SMS text, and social. With SmartAction, you can build an industry-leading self-service application once and deploy it multiple times.

Tractable.How It Works Text: 1) Your collision repairer uploads an estimate and pictures to your claims management system 2) AI Review compares the pictures and the estimate, and accurately judges the cost of repair 3) You get an assessment, flagging any potential leakage
Tractable.Value Proposition Text: AI for expert visual tasksOur AI understands images like experts do.But it can assess thousands, in seconds, with razor-sharp accuracy.So your organization can perform like never before.

Digital Reasoning.How It Works Text: The complexity of medical diagnoses and chains of communication within and between health care providers can easily produce knowledge and awareness gaps. Adding to the problem is fragmented storage of records and the inability of legacy systems to extract meaning from medical notes written in natural human language.  If health care industry data could be understood as a whole, both medical professionals and their patients would benefit from an unbroken chain of knowledge that describes their condition and its treatment. Decisions would be based on richer insights, anomalous information would be highlighted, and response times would be reduced.  Synthesys helps medical professionals achieve these outcomes. It uses cognitive computing technology that gathers, reads and understands medical data whatever its format or location and analyzes it as a whole. Knowledge gaps are filled, problems are detected sooner, and unexpected insights are brought to light.
Digital Reasoning.Value Proposition Text: We create technology that learns and gets smarter with the goal of helping humans see the world more clearly so they can solve the world’s toughest problems. Cognitive computing directly addresses these challenges.  Our cognitive computing based platform, Synthesys, understands context and emulates human reasoning and transforms huge volumes of human generated data into valuable knowledge. And like a human, Synthesys learns and improves with experience. Its accuracy and efficiency makes it possible to monitor 100% of an organization's data, making knowledge workers more productive and raising business performance in ways that no one thought previously possible.

AlphaSense.How It Works Text: •	Automatically expands your keyword searches, while filtering out false positives •	Captures synonyms for 10,000s of financial and business terms •	Gives you the confidence to act with all relevant information •	Helps you find what others miss
AlphaSense.Value Proposition Text: Linguistic search algorithms allow you to search across millions of documents with a few clicks, dramatically reducing research times: •	Leverage groundbreaking search technology purpose-built for company and thematic research •	Identify key data points, trends and themes on any 1 company or across 35,000+ global companies •	Find and get alerted to critical information buried in filings, news, research and your own content

Walnut Algorithms.How It Works Text: We combine advanced machine learning techniques with financial expertise to generate absolute return investment strategies. We develop sophisticated trading models able to continuously learn and improve. The strategies are designed to identify meaningful patterns forming in the financial markets with high levels of confidence. They scale over numerous assets globally and intelligently self-adapt to changing market conditions.
Walnut Algorithms.Value Proposition Text: Walnut Algorithms is a technology firm focused on applying the latest advances in data science and machine learning research to the financial markets.

Jewel Paymentech.How It Works Text: Fraud Wall's engines combine the best of both worlds - AI and your expertise - to manage increasingly smarter and more adaptive fraudsters.   Smart Rules Engine - Create, test, and refine custom rules or merchant thresholds to detect and prevent high-risk cardholder and merchant activities.   Transaction Risk Scoring (AI)- Our proprietary AI models analyse hundreds of data points associated with a transaction in real-time, identifying patterns that are indicative of fraud   Fraud Wall scores are passed on to the Gateway's decision tree, giving you the flexibility to route transactions based on your organisation's risk appetite. High risk transactions can be stopped before authorisation, removing costs associated with reactive investigations.
Jewel Paymentech.Value Proposition Text: Our suite of intelligent solutions help banks and payment facilitators conduct merchant due diligence and manage transaction fraud risks using predictive analytics. We also offer automated solutions to large merchants such as online marketplaces, to identify illegal and counterfeit goods as part of their KYC process. We have also been named by SWIFT as one of the most promising FinTech companies in Asia.

Neurensic.How It Works Text: Neurensic uses artificial intelligence to recognize patterns of trading that are similar to regulatory inquiries and investigations. •	CLUSTER - The system aggregates order message data into “clusters” of related intent. This makes it easy to understand overall trader behavior, rather than sorting through individual order actions. •	SCORE - We generate a “risk score” for each cluster, that represents the similarity of new activity to known activity that has drawn negative regulatory attention in the past. •	VISUALIZE - At the cluster level, it becomes easy to visualize the overall compliance risk of any cross-section of a firm, including trader, product, or sales group. Our toolset lets users prioritize the most significant threats to their organization so they can take corrective action. •	INVESTIGATE - Our cluster scorecard and market replay functionality lets compliance professionals easily visualize trader activity and its impact on other market participants.
Neurensic.Value Proposition Text: Neurensic is the culmination of thousands of hours of collaborative research between data technologists and seasoned experts in the banking, compliance, and trading industries. We show financial institutions the true power of artificial intelligence by delivering clearly prioritized calls to action. This empowers decision makers to solve challenging business problems. Our technology was designed to evolve over time to accommodate a changing financial industry. Neurensic adapts easily to new infrastructure, data sources, and regulatory mandates.

Numenta.How It Works Text: For each monitored company, data is collected every five minutes for stock price, stock volume and Twitter volume. Actual data charts can be viewed in the application. Models are automatically built and refined for each data stream. No data scientists are required! Each company is different. HTM models report anomalies when current behavior deviates from recent behavior.
Numenta.Value Proposition Text: Creation of Numenta, (Hierarchical Temporal Memory (HTM) for Stocks is an example HTM application that continually monitors hundreds of publicly traded companies and alerts you if something unusual is happening to any of them.

RiskGenius.How It Works Text: We set out to fundamentally change insurance policies. Our algorithms have processed hundreds of thousands of insurance clauses. Our customers determine how to deploy these algorithms to facilitate policy automation. Each RiskGenius Module can be integrated and customized to your unique workflow.
RiskGenius.Value Proposition Text: There are a lot of insurance processes that don’t make sense in today’s connected, digital world. The RiskGenius team is working to fix these processes by supporting insurance professionals with automation. By applying machine learning to insurance policies, we can streamline the work of underwriters, brokers and everyone in between. The result is insurance professionals can do more meaningful work for satisfied customers.

Clone Algo.How It Works Text: Make artificial Intelligence enhanced algorithm trading available to everyone at an affordable price - Artificial intelligence algorithms execute and manage risk automatically -Proven results, used to manage over US$1 billion fund - Little monitoring or expertise needed. - Generates passive income 24 hours a day, 6 days a week - Minimum capital required, US$10,000 onwards - Capital used by selected algorithms can be insured against losses - Tradable markets: FX, Futures, Contract for differences(CFD), Shares, Crude oil and Gold, with more markets to be added
Clone Algo.Value Proposition Text: Clone Algo Inc is a US incorporated Technology firm with operations based in Singapore that develops artificial intelligence trading systems for financial markets using time tested algorithms combined with timing technology and risk management systems.

Acuity Trading.How It Works Text: 1)Select widget: choose which widget you want to display on your website by selecting it from the drop down list. 2)Adjust settings: choose whether to display the widget name or give the widget a different name and adjust the colours to suit your brand. 3)Copy widget code: once you have customised the widget, copy the code displayed in the box 4)Paste widget code: paste the code in to your frame on your website
Acuity Trading.Value Proposition Text: Designed with speed of integration in mind, Acuity’s stylish and customisable widgets can be installed on your website in under 5 minutes so your clients can gain instant access to our invaluable sentiment data and start making more informed trading decisions today.  Alerting users to changes in market mood towards any given asset, the widgets are an ideal tool for traders of all experience who are looking for fresh trading ideas or more confidence in their trading strategies.

Zeitgold.Value Proposition Text: By combining experts and artificial intelligence, Zeitgold offers an end-to-end solution for managing the financials of cafés, restaurants, small retailers, and craftsmen. Zeitgold empowers the owners to get bookkeeping, payroll, invoice payment, collections and coordination with the tax advisor done in less than 10 minutes per day on their smartphones, saving around 10 hours per week.

ComplyAdvantage.How It Works Text: 1. Automatically monitor global data sources •	Tens of thousands of structured and unstructured sources •	From sanctions/watch lists to blogs and media articles •	Internal data sources to monitor customer behavior 2. Identify people & entities with AML risk •	Machine learning technology •	Understand the context and identify risk signals •	Everything is measured to ensure accuracy 3. Build profiles & enhanced data •	Identify who they are & what they are doing •	Find business & personal connections 4. Apply advanced search technology to find answers •	Sophisticated ‘elastic search’ sorts through the vast array of data •	Find the insight you’re looking for to make AML decisions quickly
ComplyAdvantage.Value Proposition Text: ComplyAdvantage is trusted by financial service companies and other regulated & high-risk corporates around the world to help protect their businesses and comply with AML/CFT/ABC regulations. We use advanced technology to help digitise processes safely and securely while increasing efficiency and effectiveness.

Skytree.How It Works Text: Skytree speeds up machine learning methods by up to 150x compared to open source options. Employing deeply optimized algorithms, Skytree performs analytics in-memory and utilizes the latest high performance computing techniques. By taking fewer mathematical steps to achieve the same result, Skytree has proven to be the fastest machine learning software on the market. Using patent-pending global optimization analytics to automate algorithm and parameter selection, Skytree saves weeks or months of effort. Instead of manually running hundreds of experiments to determine the best algorithm and parameters, Skytree does it with one click. Using patent-pending global optimization analytics to automate algorithm and parameter selection, Skytree saves weeks or months of effort. Instead of manually running hundreds of experiments to determine the best algorithm and parameters, Skytree does it with one click.
Skytree.Value Proposition Text: Built to scale to the largest and most diverse data sets while delivering the greatest predictive model accuracy, Skytree empowers data scientists to build more accurate models faster. The result? Deep analytic insights and the ability to predict future events, make recommendations, and reveal untapped markets and customers.

Lucena Research.How It Works Text: QuantDesk® is a do-it-yourself research platform for the investment professional. With QuantDesk® you can construct, backtest, and deploy an investment strategy without writing a single line of code.  We have developed a sophisticated yet easy-to-use, web enabled software geared to conduct many of the research functions that an in-house quant would do, but for a fraction of the cost.  QuantDesk® presents you with rich UI and actionable screens that will help you identify investment opportunities and help you reduce risk in your portfolio.
Lucena Research.Value Proposition Text: We serve a multitude of of clients requiring data validation, analytics and machine learning services, from investment professionals to big data providers.  For our data providers, we provide customizable data validation and research services that digest large data sets with value added features.  For our market investors, they can leverage the capabilities of in-house skilled quantitative analysts at a significantly lower price point with a scientific approach to investing.  We offer on-demand Quants for special projects and research assignments.

BehavioSec.How It Works Text: BehavioSec analyzes activity from login to logout, looking at behaviors like keystroke dynamics, touch and mouse motion, and compares it to previous interactions from the same user. It creates a session ticket and a score, using the full score from the session. That score is fed into your risk engine, so you can automatically step up security if you need to. You can also use BehavioView dashboard to see the score breakdown, and identify behaviors or anomalies BehavioSec has flagged. The algorithm stays up to date with user behaviors and skills, so that as they change and improve, so does the security layer — reducing false positives. The core algorithm is continually improved for session-based intelligence and enhanced role-based management.
BehavioSec.Value Proposition Text: We believe that great user experiences should never come with a security risk. BehavioSec has created a platform for strong, multilayered customer security. Now you can can stop fraud, prevent attacks, and verify your customers — all without slowing them down. We call it behavioral biometrics, and it uses continuous machine learning to authenticate users based, not on what they do, but on how they do it.

Cortical.io.How It Works Text: Inspired by the latest findings on how the brain processes information, Cortical.io’s Retina Engine converts language into semantic fingerprints, numerical representations that capture meaning explicitly. Cortical.io's Retina Engine is accessible through an easy-to-use, powerful platform for fast semantic search, semantic classification and semantic filtering. With the Retina Platform, you can process any kind of text, independently of language and length. Because of its high computational efficiency, it enables you to process terabytes of data orders of magnitude faster than other methods.
Cortical.io.Value Proposition Text: Cortical.io offers Natural Language Understanding (NLU) solutions based on Semantic Folding, a theory which opens a fundamentally new perspective to handling Big Text Data. The uniqueness of Cortical.io’s algorithm makes it possible to solve many open NLU challenges, like meaning-based filtering of terabytes of unstructured text data, real-time topic detection in social media and semantic searching through millions of documents across multiple languages.

SigOpt.How It Works Text: 1  Provide parameters Ping our API with your model’s parameters. We don’t need the model itself. You keep it private.   2 Use our values Our API suggests new values for these parameters. Use them to evaluate your model within your current infrastructure.   3 Send model output We use your model’s output to calculate the next best configuration.   4 Repeat until optimized You’ll reach optimal values up to 100x faster than other methods.
SigOpt.Value Proposition Text: SigOpt’s API tunes your model’s parameters through state-of-the-art Bayesian optimization. Exponentially faster and more accurate than grid search. Faster, more stable, and easier to use than open source solutions. Extracts additional revenue and performance left on the table by conventional tuning.

Sentient Technologies.How It Works Text: By identifying and deriving intelligence from previously unseen patterns in large amounts of data. Using massively scaled, distributed evolutionary computation, our patented solution mimics biological evolution. This enables it to learn, adapt and react faster to provide our customers with the answers and decisions they need.  Our deep learning technologies, working at scale, can rapidly understand human intent using visual and other non-verbal interactions, resulting in the rapid and relevant delivery of content, products and other “decisions” customers desire. It’s delight delivered with impact, on an unprecedented scale.
Sentient Technologies.Value Proposition Text: At Sentient, we’ve created the world’s largest and most powerful distributed AI platform by combining multiple AI disciplines with unmatched scale, allowing us to create fully autonomous products.

Opera Solutions.How It Works Text: With Signal Hub from Opera Solutions, an organization elevates the sophistication and efficacy of its fraud prevention efforts, systematically reducing its risk profile. Signal Hub applies rigorous data science to Big Data in a highly efficient way, rapidly revealing patterns that would be difficult or impossible to detect otherwise, packaging this insight in a readily consumable format and quickly putting that insight into action across the organization, directly into enterprise applications and execution systems that people and processes use every day. Machine learning updates the intelligence constantly, strengthening fraud prevention and reducing risk over time. Smarter analytics makes fraud uneconomical for fraudsters.
Opera Solutions.Value Proposition Text: Your company has a lot of Big Data, but most of it is simply noise. To realize value from your Big Data, you must extract intelligence from it — efficiently and in a scalable way. We call this intelligence Signals — critical descriptive and predictive pieces of information that enable better business decisions across hundreds of possible use cases.  The good news: A business needs only ~3,000 Signals to achieve breakthrough outcomes. The better news: Our Signal Hub lets you generate Signals in weeks, put them to work for your business, reuse them over time, and constantly refresh them with machine learning.

Cape Analytics.How It Works Text: •	Instantaneous data feed of comprehensive property attributes such as roof details, building footprints, and additional parcel features. •	Pull from the most current Cape data to better understand the built environment you insure. •	Select from several modules to receive property attributes most important to your underwriting models. •	Populate data across multiple environments; Underwriting systems, Broker portals, Insured portals.
Cape Analytics.Value Proposition Text: Cape Analytics establishes a new category of property data & analytics, offering immediacy and coverage comparable to pre-filled data, but with the accuracy and types of features for which an underwriter or other stakeholder may otherwise seek a more costly and time-consuming inspection report.

iSENTIUM.How It Works Text: iSentium is a leading Big Data solutions provider that pairs a unique, patented linguistics-based analytics framework with immediately actionable tools that quantify and transform unstructured social media content into powerful sentiment indicators.
iSENTIUM.Value Proposition Text: Exploit the full value of social media content to gain a competitive advantage.

CreditVidya.How It Works Text: Approve more customers and grow your portfolio responsibly by accurately assessing risk of new-to-credit and thin file customers. Decrease credit losses through improvements in pre-screen, approval, credit line, pricing and portfolio management decisions. Reduce fraud rates by automatically clearing your legitimate customers and by focusing on high risk applicants. Get unique insights into behaviours and life events of your consumers to offer the right products at the right time.
CreditVidya.Value Proposition Text: Use credit insights from 10,000+ data points to lend to new-to-credit customers and make a positive social impact!

Orbital Insight.How It Works Text: Orbital Insight develops geospatial analytics that unlock societal and economic trends at a global scale. The company works with leading providers to obtain satellite imagery, drone imagery, and other data from unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), then uses deep learning techniques to identify and quantify key features from this data. Deep learning allows Orbital Insight to analyze millions of pixels efficiently, a process that would otherwise be impossibly time-consuming to complete by hand. The company’s algorithms can count and track features like car counts, deforestation rates, new construction, flood peaks, oil storage tanks, and more. The resulting insights provide actionable information for businesses, governments, and NGOs to drive better business and policy decisions.
Orbital Insight.Value Proposition Text: Orbital Insight develops geospatial analytics that unlock societal and economic trends at a global scale. The company works with leading providers to obtain satellite imagery, drone imagery, and other data from unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), then uses deep learning techniques to identify and quantify key features from this data. Deep learning allows Orbital Insight to analyze millions of pixels efficiently, a process that would otherwise be impossibly time-consuming to complete by hand. The company’s algorithms can count and track features like car counts, deforestation rates, new construction, flood peaks, oil storage tanks, and more. The resulting insights provide actionable information for businesses, governments, and NGOs to drive better business and policy decisions.

Creamfinance.How It Works Text: At Creamfinance, we do everything online. This benefits our customers and our business – it drives our customer service as well as our own profitability and scalability. Skilled local experts and the commitment to provide the best case practice are integral of our company’s business. We put strong emphasis on the efficient communication of both technological and social knowledge and the transparency of our operations. We value fast pace, visionary attitude and transparency; these are the values we stand for and do not compromise.
Creamfinance.Value Proposition Text: Creamfinance makes consumer finance quick-to-access by using the most advanced and representative scoring techniques. This minimizes consumer effort and maximizes risk management. Utilizing advanced algorithms and machine-learning capabilities to quickly evaluate and score, we make money available anytime, everywhere.

Cleo.How It Works Text: Cleo works by securely accessing your transaction data in read-only mode. That means it can only view your encrypted transactions. Cleo does this by using a world-leading financial software called SaltEdge. Cleo then uses her smart AI brain to scan your transaction history, calculating and spotting interesting spending trends, habits and lets you keep track of budgets. Cleo also allows you to view your balance, check direct debits, latest transactions, and see your spending per category.
Cleo.Value Proposition Text: Simply put, we don’t think that current banking services or products are good enough. Our finances should be easy to understand, our spending should be more manageable, and we should be able to make better informed decisions about our financial futures. If we are given the ability to really see what’s going on with our finances, we would be better at managing them. We also strongly believe in the power of new technologies to help make it easier for us to get to know our money better. That’s why we built Cleo.

Feedzai.How It Works Text: A Superior Combination of Human & Machine Intelligence We’re using fluid machine-learning, paired with human insight and intuition. Blending the two creates a powerful combination that both understands and prevents fraud. This cutting edge intelligence means Feedzai future-proofs your business against technologies that will evolve to defraud your company.  ico_possibilities_80x80 The Power to Transform Data into Infinite Possibilities The more data you have, the more power your business can harness for fraud detection and prevention. You no longer have to be daunted by the sheer volume of data and information. Feedzai helps you thrive in the overwhelming mass, and turns big data into insights and tools to reduce risk and eradicate fraud.  ico_arrow-solid_80x80 Changing the Rules and the Entire Game We’ve built a powerful platform with foresight into next-gen fraud technology and giving real utility to data feeds that come from new and unexpected sources. Feedzai is looking at commerce transaction as an ecosystem model, we’re disrupting the conventional thinking about risk and offers a pioneering approach to fraud protection.
Feedzai.Value Proposition Text: A choice of a cloud-hosted solution or an onsite deployment in your data center. Flexible and rapid execution combined with unique features and functionality purpose-built to fight fraud.

Socure.How It Works Text: D+ performs a massive online search in real-time across 400+ social network sites, public directories and the broader internet, to find any and all digital presence and behavior information available about that identity.  The platform also sources identity data including phone, email, address, and IP intelligence from trusted, authoritative providers.   The cloud-based software then intelligently filters ‘noise’, and correlates and resolves data points associated with the correct identity.   Socure applies sophisticated machine learning models against the returned intelligence, and leverages that data science to make predictions of the probability that the identity is real and intent to commit fraud. The ID+ API outputs all of the derived intelligence from this process on each element of the identity, the correlation between the different pieces of the identity, the proof points that corroborate that information, and model based-predictive scores to the requesting entity--all in a round trip of just a few seconds.
Socure.Value Proposition Text: Leading companies rely on Socure's highly accurate digital identity verification suite to accept more new customers while dramatically reducing fraud. We use a proprietary artificial intelligence platform that analyzes vast quantities of online and offline data to determine if an identity is authentic and belongs to the user.  Our solutions easily integrate into existing workflows to instantly verify users through a simple API call.

WorkFusion.How It Works Text: WorkFusion’s AI-powered products provide all of the tools an operations team needs to automate business processes.RPA is one of the tools in WorkFusion’s automation toolkit. Most business processes begin with pulling data and end with pushing data, and WorkFusion makes RPA easy to apply to business processes that tap into legacy applications.
WorkFusion.Value Proposition Text: WorkFusion’s AI-powered products provide all of the tools an operations team needs to automate business processes.

Paxata.How It Works Text: Quickly access or import from a wide variety of enterprise and cloud data sources. Search, explore and discover data sources, tables, columns, files, projects and data values using names, tags or descriptions. Explore data in real-time with visual, interactive data preparation to quickly understand data and identify data analysis needs. Data type specific histograms, visualizations, dashboards, and visual data quality heat maps highlight patterns, duplicates, blanks, errors and missing data.  Interactively standardize similar values using Natural language processing (NLP), .Aggregate, pivot, depivot, and transpose data rapidly into any shape with a single click. Paxata provides shaping recommendations based on the data structure and offers visual cues to shape data for every analytic use case. Use machine learning to automatically profile data sets and get recommendations for advanced single-click auto integration or append — saving time and effort. Turn raw data into clean, contextual and ready-to-use AnswerSet.
Paxata.Value Proposition Text: Paxata is the pioneer that intelligently empowers all business consumers to transform raw data into ready information, instantly and automatically, with an enterprise-grade, self-service data preparation application built on an Adaptive Information Platform powered by machine learning.

Clarity Money.How It Works Text: Clarity Money built a system that analyzes your specific financial situation and works tirelessly to improve it. Clarity Money serves as your advocate, working to get you the most from your money. They harness the power of artificial intelligence (AI), machine learning and data science to personalize your experience, using a combination of Natural Language Processing, Anomaly Detection and Spectral Analysis.
Clarity Money.Value Proposition Text: Clarity Money is a mobile app that acts as your financial champion, finding you clear actionable ways to save money, by canceling wasteful accounts, getting you a better deal on a credit card, even even lowering your bills - all within the app.

Aire.How It Works Text: Our Interactive Virtual Interview (IVI) engages directly with the applicant to evaluate their profession, education, lifestyle and financial maturity. This is similar to how a human underwriter would have interviewed the applicant... adaptive & responsive! Our machine-learning solution is seamless to implement and provides companies with access to new markets while optimizing acquisition costs. We step in where the automated decision engine is unable to decide. We provide global yet lightweight and flexible solutions tailored to partners’ needs. Current data suggests we can increase acceptance by 14% and integration is neither time consuming nor expensive.
Aire.Value Proposition Text: We believe that people themselves are the best source of data for their credit and identity profiles. We use a fresh new approach to credit scoring that is built ground-up from first principles but still respecting the privacy of our users.

Kensho.Value Proposition Text: Kensho deploys scalable machine learning and analytics systems across the most critical government and commercial institutions in the world to solve some of the hardest analytical problems of our time.

SmartZip Analytics.How It Works Text: Our predictive analytics engine examines this vast pool of data to find local seller signals and make listing predictions for your area. We run each territory separately, as selling triggers in Omaha will differ from what causes someone in Manhattan to list.  With a SmartTargeting territory, you get access to selling predictions for a territory near you, so you can narrow your focus and win more listings. Together with a SmartTargeting expert, you'll map a custom territory that offers you the highest turnover and commission potential in your market area.  We back-test and share the accuracy of our predictions starting on day one. You'll always know how your territory's performance is stacking up to local market activity.
SmartZip Analytics.Value Proposition Text: Prospect easier and smarter with a single platform that combines big data, predictive analytics and automated marketing to grow your business.

Trooly.How It Works Text: We check the validity of input information, check that we have permission under FCRA to process the input, and perform numerous proprietary identity maps to develop a robust and compliant input identity. In real time, we gather digital footprints from four types of data sources: the public web, the dark web, permissible social media, and our own aggregation of digital public records. At this stage, we typically get thousands of pieces of data per input identity that we have to process. Our platform has outstanding identity matching models that allow us to match an input identity to a digital source with high confidence. We are able to do fuzzy matching with high probabilities, which gives us a huge advantage over legacy solutions which rely only on exact matches to huge amounts of intrusive input identity information. In addition to ensuring a digital record matches an input identity, we make sure that we understand the context of a digital source so that we extract only what is relevant to the input identity. Once we are done with cutting edge identity matching and information extraction, thousands of pieces of data usually boil down to a handful of relevant ones. With the relevant extracted data, we run over 30 machine learned models to score the input identity on a series of trust-related traits learned from ground truth data from our customers, proprietary ground truth data that we have gathered independently, and from a range of academic and commercial models. At this final stage, we configure, combine and weight our underlying traits in a way that best predicts the target behavior that our customer is seeking to understand.
Trooly.Value Proposition Text: We apply cutting edge computer science to enable more rewarding business and personal interactions

Applied Data Finance.How It Works Text: • Uses "4th Gen" underwriting, a fully automated technique with data- and optimization-driven characteristics  • Leverages knowledge of consumer behavior across the full credit spectrum enabling us to effectively price, manage, and monitor risk  • Incorporates risk, prescreen, conversion, fraud, and lifetime profitability models
Applied Data Finance.Value Proposition Text: ADF is a rapidly growing participant in a large and expanding market for loans to less-than-prime borrowers for whom we provide a superior product. ADF uses a proprietary methodology and advanced data science to make a more accurate assessment of a borrower's true creditworthiness. ADF's inaugural brand, Personify Financial, extends credit at responsible, risk-appropriate rates with a product that is fair, transparent, and easy to understand.

indico data solutions.How It Works Text: The Custom Collections Training API allows you to train a text or image model on top of our rich feature embeddings. With just a couple hundred text examples or about 50 image examples, you can train a model that would otherwise require hundreds of thousands of examples.  You don't need to worry about hardware or model construction. Simply add your examples, tell the model to train, and make predictions.  For example, if you want to train a model to determine whether an article would be popular with your users, you give your model 100 examples of articles that your users like and 100 articles that they don't. Building a model for this task from scratch would require at least 50,000 examples, but because our Custom Collections models are pretrained to already understand the relationships between words, they are able to function well with far less training on your end.
indico data solutions.Value Proposition Text: indico allows your computer to explore text and image data in a natural way. There's no doubt that analytics have come a long way from gut feelings. That said, today's solutions miss the core of the human experience. People want to investigate trends that live outside of 1's and 0's. Whether you're in a board room or a dorm room, we'll make machine learning the easiest part of your project.

Descartes Labs.How It Works Text: While humans immediately recognize visual similarity, they cannot analyze the millions of individual scenes that satellites generate daily. We built GeoVisual Search to do just that.  1) Tile source maps Divide the globe into a grid of tiles. We use multiple, overlapping grids, capturing features that would otherwise run across tiles.  2) Extract features For each image tile, use a neural network to extract features (e.g., shapes, colors, texture). Features can include both the visible and non-visible spectrum.  3) Query features Given a query image, calculate a “visual distance” between the query features and the features extracted from each image in the comparison set.  4) Match results The tiles with the smallest “visual distance” are visually similar to the query tile.
Descartes Labs.Value Proposition Text: The Descartes Labs Platform is the missing link in making satellite imagery useful. We collect data daily from public and commercial imagery providers, clean it, calibrate it, and store it in an easy-to-access file system, ready for scientific analysis.

Shift Technology.How It Works Text: Claim handlers are the main productive force of insurance companies. The decrease of the combined ratio first depends on their productivity and satisfaction. That is why we closely work with claim handlers, helping them use and understand our solution, until they master all of its aspects. The digital transformation of insurance does not simply consist of integrating new technology and reorganizing processes. It requires the right interplay between technology and people, supervised by the right vision. We provide insurance managers all the tools and support to achieve this transformation. Claim handling is highly technical because it requires taking every specific case into account. Furthermore, these specificities vary between countries and insurance companies, due to different regulations, covers or claims processes. Our people adapt the solution to each insurer by working with claim handlers and translating their feedback into mathematical formulas.
Shift Technology.Value Proposition Text: The recent scientific and technological progress in machine learning has enabled us to design better solutions to existing problems. The Shift Technology solution exploits it in a dedicated way for insurance with models that faithfully represent its complexity.

ZestFinance.How It Works Text: Most traditional underwriting systems use fewer than 50 data points for credit decisions. The Zest Automated Machine Learning (ZAML) platform is an end-to-end underwriting solution that allows you to take advantage of machine learning and thousands of data points, at scale, and with speed and full transparency. With ZAML, you can more accurately assess thin-file and no-file borrowers—such as millennials—that traditional underwriting systems overlook.
ZestFinance.Value Proposition Text: ZestFinance has been developif prospng and refining its underwriting platform as it provided credit scores for hundreds of millions oective borrowers worldwide. Now, with ZAML, we’re offering our end-to-end technology platform and underwriting expertise to financial firms around the world.

As all the logic is built in we can achieve a rapid installation, with fast ROI as standard. The logic that we have built means we can take you to world class and beyond in 6-12 weeks, achieving world beating match rates of 90% and above in many cases. Overspending on labor? Legion’s precise forecasting technology ensures you spend the right amount on labor without negatively impacting the customer experience. Labor Forecasts are over 95% accurate and require no human input.

Dimebox.How It Works Text: Dimebox provides a Payment Intelligence Platform that offers advanced technology to financial institutions, helping them to improve and expand their payment processing business. The product vision is to support the full range of relevant operational requirements, in a technologically-advanced and highly-automated manner. The solution is fully transaction-centric, forming the basis of its capability to transform transactional data into value-added services, in real time. Dimebox reverse-engineered the way payments schemes process transactions. We rebuilt and enhanced the technical core, focussing on the essentials, enhanced with cutting-edge features, and with functionality that is highly independent of the type of payment stakeholder to which you want to connect. Our technology is modular by design, adapting to current and future business needs. The platform can be leveraged in stages, incrementally building on existing functionality. The integration and gateway layer, the data module and business intelligence tools, as well as the next-generation payment-processing engine, can be selectively deployed to meet customer needs. Dimebox taps into existing business processes, and with its high level of automation reduces the resource requirements to operate the service.
Dimebox.Value Proposition Text: We go beyond Payment Processing. We enable financial institutions to become front-runners in their respective field by providing them with white-label payment technology.

This is done with zero code changes, special skills or proprietary APIs. Using an adaptive combination of acceleration techniques - like native compilation, vectorization, locality optimization and custom data connectors - Bigstream provides faster time-to-insight and cost avoidance of up to 50% of your EMR expense.

Algoriz.How It Works Text: 1) Design executable strategies by typing out your ideas or using our standardized modules 2) Test your algos using live market data on our simulated matching engine and commission model 3) Deploy trading strategies on our platform with real-time performance feedback and customized risk control settings
